case.state: Ah, it's nice to meet you all here to... Oh dear. ~Player~, I... uh... is it really appropriate to dress like that in front of man such as myself?
~Player~, I don't want to alarm you... but it seems you forgot your pants back in the ladies room.
Err... ~player~? Your... it's... you seem to have f-forgotten your pants.
Hello everyone, my name is Marth and I look forward to... excuse me. Where are this man's pants?
~Player~... Is that how ladies dress where you come from?
Oh? You're not wearing a top, ~player~? What are you, some kind of berserker?
You may call me Marth. I can say no more than this just now.
I'm not normally one for leisure, but I do need a rest... Very well, you may call me Marth.
I don't mind undressing around others, nor any forfeit. Just as long as no one gets hurt.
My goodness, did I miss a memo about an Order of Heroes reunion being held here today? Greetings, friends. It's been a while.
Hmmm... this game is just an unusual way to get ourselves ready for swimming, correct?
Oh, my apologies. I'm used to standing very close to others when I'm preparing for battle.
It seems I find myself in the company of two pegasus knights. You may call me Marth.
Your uniform's nationality may be unknown to me, but I know pegasus knights when I see them.
You two are both pegasus knights, are you not? I have some experience fighting alongside them on the battlefield where I come from.
Hello everyone, my name is Marth and I look forward to... Pardon me, but who exactly is that girl speaking to?
Wait... Captain Falcon? What's this dastard doing here?
Yes, I am indeed Marth. I'm sorry, but have we met before?
Yes, you stand before Marth himself... If you don't mind me asking, should I know you?
(Interesting, that girl is clearly a pegasus knight, and yet her uniform is not of a style I have ever seen before.)
(If I'm not mistaken, based on her clothing that girl seems to be a pegasus knight of some foreign nation.)
Ah, you wouldn't happen to be a pegasus knight, would you? My name is Marth.
Ah, a pegasus knight? The name's Marth, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance.
I'm pretty sure my name is Marth, great Goddess. Lucina is someone different.
I have my secrets and my reasons, Jin. They likely would not interest you.
Lucina? You must be mistaken, my name is Marth.
Ah, you recognize me? Yes, you do indeed stand before Marth himself in the flesh. It's a pleasure to meet you.
I may wear a butterfly mask... but I've never seen something like this before! It's... it's nice to meet you, miss butterfly. My name is Marth.
Oh? What do we have a here? A spirit of some kind? Well, it seems... friendly enough. ... Greetings, I am Marth.
Princess Laevatein! What are you doing here? Did Surtr send you to oppose me?
If it isn't Ms. Goneril! It's good to see you again; I trust you've been doing well since we last met in Askr?
I'm no stranger to traveling between worlds, but this realm seems... different than the ones I have visited previously.
If you all care to duel, I'd be happy to test myself against you.
So it's a game of wits integrated with risk assessment? Sounds simple enough, let's begin.
I hope you don't mind the intrusion. I'm unfamiliar with these parts and am simply looking to rest here for a moment.
I can't promise I'll be staying for long. I'm seeking aid for a rather important mission and can't afford to rest anymore than I need to.
Oh? There are only three of us playing this game together? I was informed that five was considered the norm.
I guess I'll trade ~cards~ cards.
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
I'll take ~cards~ cards, please.
Perhaps changing cards is my best hope. I'll swap ~cards~ cards.
I'd like to trade ~cards~ cards, please.
~Player~, I'll be exchanging ~cards~ cards.
Hmm... I guess I'll take ~cards~ cards.
This hand could be better. I'll swap ~cards~ cards, ~player~.
(Wait! Isn't this a Royal Flush? That practically makes my victory guaranteed... Still, I shouldn't let my guard down.)
You won't believe the hand Naga just blessed me with...
It would seem the scales have been tipped in my favor!
Sorry, but this game has just been decided.
The path to victory is clear!
Don't try anything funny Captain, I brought Falchion with me for a reason...
Falcon, you may have beaten me last time we dueled, but this time things will be different!
Don't think for a second I've forgotten what you did to Father, I won't forgive you for that.
It would seem I'm on a winning streak!
I cannot accept these cards. Not when our masks are supposed to be coming off.
(Trying to lose is surprisingly difficult...)
My path is clear!
It would seem fate smiles upon me today.
I'll be upfront with you, you're out-matched.
Be it battle, or a game a cards, a king's duty is to triumph!
It would seem I do not need much practice to excel in this game.
One day I shall be worthy of the title "Hero King". On an unrelated note, my hand is excellent!
The future is not written!
Good. I must stay this course.
Excellent. I feel like I'm improving.
Finding synergistic pairs... (I suppose it's not terribly different from what he was talking about.)
Checkmate!
Never take good fortune for granted.
You will not stop me!
It's my turn to win!
For my father!
You'll never defeat me!
By Father's sword, and my own hands... I will win this game!
People need to cast aside their differences to stand against the Fell Dragon. When I first arrived I wasn't fully prepared to see people fighting each other.
(A place like this could never exist in the era of Grima. I should take full advantage of my time here.)
Having experienced several bad hands leading up to this point, I'm grateful to have a break.
Good. I must obtain more hands like this if I am to have any chance of victory.
I'll give you this chance to lay down your arms, and surrender peacefully, ~winner~.
One cannot take any chances, although with this hand... I don't think I need to worry much.
Don't count me out, ~player~. You never know what kind of vantage I might have!
No matter how out of my element I may be, I will never fall without a fight!
I've never given up in the past. Did any of you actually think this game would be an exception?
Don't count me out just yet!
I can still win this, just watch me!
Hope will never die!
I will not let another Ylissean garment be taken!
I've decided. If I survive the war, I'm going to dedicate my life to seeing as many as I can of the cities and wonders that were mere ruins in the future.
I'll give you this chance to lay down your arms, and surrender peacefully, ~winner~.
Clearly I need to sharpen my wit if I am to stand a chance against ~winner~.
What happens next?
You all seem far more capable with cards. Still, I will give it all I have!
Everyone, please watch over me.
Hmm... good enough.
I pray my efforts were adequate.
I must say, I find the notion of wagering clothing... charming? Taking people's coin doesn't really appeal to me.
Not bad...But I'll continue to improve with more experience.
It's a nice change of pace to take gambles, knowing nothing is truly at stake.
What would a tactician do...
Hmm? What have we here? Seems decent enough.
I'm not terribly fond of leaving things up to chance.
I can win this round... Well, at least I hope that's the case.
~Player~, would you be interested coordinating some plays together? I see no reason as to why we should compete alone.
I've visited multiple Outrealms and have yet to find anything or anyone that can help the Shepherds. I fear I am to return home empty handed.
Making friends has been... surprisingly easy in this time. I wasn't expecting to engage with so many people.
I admit, I'm enjoying myself here a lot more than I anticipated.
There was a time where I would have given up in this position.
It's alright. I just need to pull myself together...
I pray the rest of you are prepared? Come what may, let's share our hands!
I'm starting to feel rather tired. Perhaps I should stay here after the game.
I wonder if this is how regular princesses get undressed. Every piece of clothing has felt like a ceremony.
Hmm... I can't let my guard down again.
There was a deck of cards I found in the future, and I never could figure out what they were used for... This is not what I imagined.

condition.saying: I'd better start preparing myself for *gulp my un...underwear.

case.state: I'm preparing myself for the same thing. Let's see who loses first!
It would seem that I'm off to a poor start...
From fully equipped to bare skinned, it's been a long journey. Thank you all for accompanying me.
If we are to trust each other, then I cannot keep my mask on any longer. It wouldn't be right.
But…
I admit, I may have been a bit overconfident.
I won't get anywhere if I blame faulty luck. Still...
This does not bode well for my future.
I've recovered from many mistakes in past, yet their weight never lessens.
(I won't be able to win anyone to my cause if I play like this.)
I was a bit reckless...
Blast, I was sure that was going to work.
I cannot settle for this, even if it is just a game.
Forgive me. My mind was dwelling somewhere else...
Fie! You really expect me to work with such a hand?
Forgive me everyone. I'm not very capable when it comes to casual affairs.
(They likely would prefer a skilled opponent, and I could be training right now. Should I really be spending my time here?)
This is surprisingly difficult.
I don't think I shall ever grow accustomed to the warm carefree bustle of present day taverns.
I must be prepared for the worst.
Must I fall here?
Wait! May I try again? I just realized-Oh blast. It's far too late now.
Nngh, No! I must keep fighting to win... but this hand doesn't help.
... Damn it. I thought I'd outgrown that mistake.
Is this really all I have to work with?
(I could try and bluff, but is that really something I want to get good at?)
I tried going for something flashy, but it ended up just being impracticable.
(Pssst... Lady Palutena. Please just play along for now, I'm trying to get a feel for this place.)
No need to make accusations, Leonie. After all, ~Player~ didn't know I was a woman at the start... You didn't... right, ~Player~?
I don't know, I kind of like having ~player~ here, he adds a bit of variety.
This is really embarrassing. I... I really don't know what came over me. Sorry, Yusuke.
Florina, from what I understand they are actually both the same person, but from different versions of the same world? I know it's somewhat confusing.
Florina, you and Lyn are obviously close friends, what more is there to speculate about?
You're fine, Florina. A good friend like Lady Lyn certainly wouldn't end her relationship with you over something like this.
I'm not actually Marth, but the Hero King really did exist. He accomplished many mighty feats back in his day. As a descendant of his, it is my duty to live up to his legacy.
Please calm yourself, Bernadetta. If anything, I... I should be asking you for forgiveness due to my deception.
Bernadetta, I wouldn't have donned a disguise if I wasn't aiming to have fooled at least a few people. You're fine.
Oh my! This new outfit of yours is most delightful. I've never seen such clothing before, it's quite cute!
No need to be so down on yourself about it. It's the exact kind of thing my sister would come up with, I bet she'd even join you!
Florina, you don't need to be so embarrassed about the whole Underwear Knights thing, I really do think you two were cute together while it lasted.
A sweet tooth? I know someone willing to do any job as long as he is repaid in sweets. Perhaps you should meet.
Forgive me, Sakura. That took a lot of courage from you. I'll cast aside my previous experiences and not treat you as Risen.
They told me we'd be going down to the skin on top of some sort of forfeit... Did you really not know what you were signing up for, Florina?
Oh dear, did they not tell you? Why would anyone withhold that information from her?
Oh? Happy birthday, Jura! I know we may still be strangers, but I hope you enjoy your time here with us today.
Oh, it's your birthday? Well, I hope you enjoy it. Every year we are given is a precious thing.
(Cute... boys? Oh, not this again... )
Me? A cute boy? Well... I suppose there is no reason to correct you.
Hmm... "clown"? Is that what they call jesters in your world, Florina?
Ah, you two really are close friends, aren't you?
I happen to have strong affection for daisies. We had a garden when I was a child.
(Thank the Gods Nami is back to normal. I had no idea what to do about that...)
Oh, that's just Corrin's regular footwear... or lack of footwear, I guess...
If we had a picture of that wretched bee, surely we could use it to warn others of the danger it poses?
So you've know Ninian as well, Florina? I happened to meet her in a land called Askr, she was the dancer for the squad I was comrades with at the time.
An entire swarm? That's awful! If Lyn hadn't saved you... well, let's not scare Florina any further.
Weiss, I had to guess... you two probably come from parallel worlds. Perhaps one with a slightly different series of events.
I agree Florina, Revy is not proving herself to be an enjoyable game partner.
Revy, you're making lady Florina upset. Please desist this behavior at once.
Florina is correct. Revy, I must insist that you consider her feelings on the matter.
I'm sure your luck will be turning around for the better soon Florina, just you wait and see.
Wait, purple isn't a common color for hair where you live? Huh, what a odd world you herald from...
Wait... Lady Palutena and Pit? What a pleasant surprise to see you two here of all places!
You propose a temporary alliance, Hilda? I wouldn't be opposed to it, but given how this game works... I don't think it's a possibility.
Can't say I know much about the techniques of Earth girls, I've only briefly met a couple of them before. Apologies, I've never really had the time to consider pursuing a romance.
Florina, I'm glad to see that you've managed to build some confidence again.
That dress truly is lovely, I'd love to wear something like it myself after I manage to restore peace to my world.
Hmm... that dress you are wearing is fine, but wouldn't it be even more cute with a pegasus pattern printed all over it?

condition.saying: Music? Well, I'm partial to the Pegasus Counting Song.

case.state: W-wait, the Pegasus Counting Song? My mother sang that song to me and my sister back when we were just little girls...

condition.saying: That coat would be nice back where I grew up, Mei. Ever heard of Ilia? It's a very snowy place.

case.state: Florina, if you don't mind, I'd love to hear more about your homeland of Ilia sometime.
Yes Florina, I feel it too. Something isn't right here... (Could it be fell magic?)
Florina, you sense it too? Stay on your guard... something isn't right here.
... I honestly have no idea how you've managed to lose so much clothing so quickly.
I'm rooting for you Florina, I think it's only fair that someone else takes a turn this time.
I'm suspicious as well. Dealer, you're not giving Florina bad cards on purpose, are you?
Dead? I... I fear with all the time I've spent traversing worlds, I may have lost track of the situation back in Askr.
That lecherous bee seems intent on stripping your bunny suit from your body. I apologize for my failure to stop it.
Personally, I'm planning on going swimming once the game is finished. The water looks great!
It's actually pretty comfortable, Florina. You'll see in due time.
Florina, compared to our complete lack of clothing, I don't think you are in any position to be complaining...

condition.saying: About me? Well, I'm... I'm a bunny!

case.state: Yes, I can see that you are a bunny. Spring-festival outfits are so adorable, are they not?
Your dress really is quite cute Florina, I see why you are fond of it.

condition.saying: I guess this isn't too different from wearing a swimsuit. Of course...I'm always too shy to wear a two piece.

case.state: I suppose? I have a cute two piece swimsuit myself, but that's designed to be seen by other people. I doubt they do that for underwear...
You know what, I'm feeling inclined to take you up on that offer. Mulan... I accept your challenge. Be warned though, I have no intention of losing.
My apologies, Mulan, but I'm afraid that I must decline. Given my current state, making such a bet would be foolish.
Be it luck or increasing skill on your part, I'm glad to see that you've still got some pegasus knight fighting spirit left in you.

Let's see... be aggressive, audacious, and take the initiative whenever possible, yet you must not strike wildly and blindly. Be aware of your surroundings, and... sorry, I could go on for hours, but we have a game to play. Perhaps later.
I'm glad to see that your luck seems to have turned around for the better, Florina. At least for now.
To be completely honest, you getting a good hand only now seems like a rather cruel joke. Dealer, you aren't messing with Florina... are you?
Florina, you say have another good hand? Wow, at this rate, you might just win after all!
Florina, you've got another great hand? Your luck has really turned around for the better!
It seems Florina is putting up a solid last-ditch defense! Good for her, I say.
The tension is incredible, and this whole game is quite novel. I'm glad to be playing here tonight.
If it makes you feel any better Florina, I could be joining you any round now.
You know, I wouldn't actually object to you putting your bra back on until someone else loses theirs, but I doubt the others here would agree to that...
I agree Florina, this is bringing back unpleasant memories of a certain multiversal combat tournament I've participated in...
You forgot your weapon? Where I come from, we needed to always be ready for combat, no matter the time or place.
All things considered, I'd rather avoid losing this game. Sorry about that.
I hope you don't serious intend to use that knife. There will be problems if you do.
I simply wish to live out peaceful days with those I hold dear. At the very least, I can try to provide them a safe future.
Shimikaze... were you just speaking Hoshidan for a minute? How curious.
Hmm... based on your outfit... a lady of the night, perhaps?
Excuse me, Komi. But you intend on stopping there, yes? I don't want you to lose everything from one mistake.
Komi, you can keep the rest of your clothes on for now. There's no reason to put yourself at a disadvantage.
I... can't really say that I've had time to read many books since my more peaceful childhood days... ah, sorry. I shouldn't go into that.
(Wow, she's really eager to show off, isn't she?)
Wow! You really are confident, even in the face of defeat. I admire that!

condition.saying: Wait! I traded the wrong card!

case.state: I don't think the rules allow for take backs...Do they?
Good. I enjoy seeing you in a more confident light, Florina. It suits you.
It's been a pleasure watching you grow over the course of the game. Keep at it, Florina!
Hmmm... I'll take a Baileys Irish Cream, they're a favorite of mine when I travel to other realms.
"Anal"? I'm not entirely sure I understand what you are asking, Sei. What exactly is this "anal"?
Showing off in the face of defeat? I shouldn't of expected less from someone like you, Juri.
(Pit's rear guard is surprisingly well-toned. I wonder if he makes it a point to train it. )
Pit...? Are you trying to strike some sort of pose? Or is there actually something of note over there?
Are they really that difficult to tie? I never had a chance to attend an academy, so I'll admit I know little of school uniforms.
(I remember that Hilda was a bit indolent, but... wow. All that over a neckerchief?)
What? She's a Risen in disguise? Stay back everyone, this could get dangerous!
Yes Florina, I dare say that you've seemingly gotten quite good at this game.
You've been holding your own for so long, surely you can keep it up a little longer?
Florina, I don't know what this game's future holds, but I wish you the best of luck.
I'm normally quite competitive, but there's something about you Florina that makes me want to see you win. Best of luck!
Lady Florina, I must say, your skill at this game is incredible.
Florina, are you blessed with some sort of divine protection? Your luck has been astonishing.
Florina... You're not pretending to be afraid of poker to gain an edge over us, are you? You've been a little too well.
You've got quite the win streak going Florina, I'm quite impressed.
Florina, for someone who claims to be a beginner, I see that you are doing pretty well.
Are you sure they don't count? From what I remember, even the smallest... ah, never mind. (Never interrupt your opponent while they are making a mistake.)

condition.saying: most in-shape guy

case.state: I think you have a perfectly fine body, Pit. It's very... functional.
You know... for someone who claims to not be in shape, you still manage to be an absolute terror on the battlefield.
Oh? Are you self-conscious about yourself? You look fine, Pit, trust me.
You have what? I'm pretty new to this myself, Hilda, but from what I've heard that's a very strong hand!
Your friend doesn't make me quite as comfortable as you do, Sakura. But, I'll extend my trust to her on your behalf.
You know of Hector? In a land called Askr, I fought alongside a young man of incredible strength by that name...

The tale of my world's creation has long been lost to the passage of time, but I can tell you that personally met with a being named Yune, an aspect of a goddess who created a continent called Tellius.
In my nation, we worship a being named Naga. It is said that she has guided mankind since ancient times, and my sword Falchion was forged from one of her sacred fangs.
I... that... I'm sorry, but that doesn't seem like a conversation I should take involve myself in.
I've seen so many worlds with so many different histories that I don't even know where I'd begin...
... The death of a loved one is one such example. Making light of this sort of painful experience is distasteful, at best.
I'm flattered, but I'm afraid that as of the moment I must decline. I'm on my own recruiting mission after all.
I'll do my best to keep your desire for privacy in mind, Florina.
Don't worry Florina, I'll be doing my best to focus on the cards and not on you.
Fa... Ping? I'm afraid I don't really understand.
I... hmmm... No, I think not. Such a rule is much too dangerous to risk while playing a game with strangers.
Sot you've finally decided to show yourself... Pardon me, is this statue your true form? You're not under a curse, are you?
I do change for mounted combat, but the helmet's a bit big and the uniform lacks pants. It's not my preference.
What? Oh... umm... Ah! Yes! I definitely remember you now, sorry about that. (Who is this girl and why does she think I know her?)
The reason I am wearing a mask is not something I wish to divulge. (... Is she flirting with me?)
My friend Severa loves to help in small ways. She taught me how to shorten my hair with a braid because "Marth would look stupid with long hair." Her words, not mine!
The last time I had a major reveal like that was when my father first discovered my identity. It was stressful, but now I look back at it quite fondly!
I suppose you could call my mask a rather... sentimental item. The few times it's broken, repairing it has been a top priority.
Marth was one of my ancestors. I carry his blade, but some days I feel the need to borrow his name as well. How did he stay so headstrong against such impossible odds?
When masquerading as my ancestor, I have to be mindful of the way my actions could affect people's perception him. I'm glad to be proceeding as myself and nothing more.
My mask conceals the birthmark on my eye, which links me directly as a decedent of the Exalt. Our ties to the Goddess Naga gives us many enemies across the realms.
I had high expectations for my Father's strike force, but what I didn't except was just how humble everyone was. It's truly an honor to work with the Shepherds.
I hope my friends are okay. We all agreed to go back in time to save our parents. To stop Grima at any cost. In truth though, I don't know what I'd do if I lost even one of them.
In my timeline, Father was betrayed by one of his closest allies right when he thought the fighting was finally over. It... makes it rather difficult for me to trust anyone.
I never really knew my Father as a child. He was always out, fighting to protect our home. One day, his sword came home, and nothing else...
Our tactician Robin always manages to make optimistic points about the future that I can't argue against. I... find I sleep best at night whenever I hear one of his speeches.
I had heard so many stories of what was lost when our world was destroyed... but actually going back and seeing it... Everything just hit me all at once.
Take those cards, dealer. If you're going to steal a hand from Ignatz, it's only fair I give him one as compensation.
That sounds lovely Florina, if I win I'd be happy to take you up on that offer.
A ride with you on your pegasus? I'd love that Florina.
Speaking of pegasus rides, back when I was a young child, I used to go riding with mother before she... well... sorry, never mind.
At this rate this perverted bee will have Florina completely naked and vulnerable to its lewd intent.
I think I'll decline to answer your question. Sorry, Nugi. (Now that she's bringing it up, I wouldn't mind getting a better look at ~player~...)
(Does she really not see how massive her lead is? For her sake, it's good she's winning, but it's a little bothersome.)
You have this game secured Florina! That said, I'm still not giving up!
I'll join you if it comes down to it, Florina, but it would be poor form to the others if I just threw the game. Hold out just a little longer.
Is being topless here really so bad when it's with a friend, Florina? No matter what happens, I have your back!
I can't say I expected to be in this situation when I woke up this morning... but I'm glad it's with you, Florina.
No need to be so self-conscious, Florina. At this rate, I'm sure that there will be plenty more exposed bodies right alongside yours.
Florina, I know this may seem like scant comfort, but I'll probably be joining you soon.
Well, Lady Palutena... this is it. No matter the outcome of this round, no hard feelings, alright?

condition.saying: Are... are you sure there's no bee in here?

case.state: Umm... I hate to say this, but I'm pretty sure I heard something buzzing around...

condition.saying: There it is! I'm sure that was a b-bee!

case.state: Come now, I don't see what all the fuss i—EEEEEEK! That thing is huge!
Yes, I would be happy to cheer lady Catria on. (Wait... wouldn't that mean cheering for myself to lose?)

condition.saying: Do you think I could borrow your mask sometime, Lucina? M-maybe I could talk to men more easily if they thought I was one.

case.state: I'm afraid that I can't loan you my mask, perhaps I could get one made for you. Gerome is quite talented.

condition.saying: So why were you pretending to be a male, Lucina? Oh, so other men wouldn't try talking to you here, right?

case.state: I use that mask when traveling the Outrealms to keep the brand in my eye hidden. Concealing my identity as Ylissean royalty helps avoid... unnecessary questions.
"Exchange numbers"? What does that mean? Is that some sort of numerology thing?
It's often best I avoid meddling in the affairs of other worlds. This mask helps me keep my distance, let's leave it at that.
(How in Naga's name I am supposed to answer a question like that!?) I... uh... maybe?
W-what... um. What was there that needed to be said? (Seriously, what would Marth even say to that?)
I... I think I saw something flying out of the corner of my eye... be on your guard.
I'm pretty sure I heard something buzzing over there... be on your guard.
It's fine Florina, no need to apologize.
If it returns, I'll do my utmost to slay it. I swear this to you!
We cannot just allow this lewd insect to continue striking Florina with impunity.
... If it makes you feel any better Florina, I... I don't really know how to properly respond to seeing a man's privates either.
(That was the last thing I was expecting to hear from Florina... Still, at least she seems to finally be enjoying herself a little.)
No, that wasn't really what I meant Florina. I suppose that does answer my question in a semi roundabout way though.

condition.saying: So...anybody want to trade? I have hearts! You accept those, right?

case.state: Oh! Lady Palutena, you want to trade? Well... let's see what I've got to offer in return...
Oh? That's unfortunate. I myself had a card I was consider giving as an offering.
Everyone, stand completely still! Ignatz, take your time looking, we'll be here until you find them.
(That's a relief. For a moment it seemed like I might have to chase her down to return her things to her.)
I'd like to give you advice, Fina. But I'm pretty new to poker as well. What do you say we work on improving together?
There's no food I can't live without but I there is a delicacy I found called shaved ice while visiting a hotrealm. Perhaps you've heard of such a thing?
I'm... not really sure how to answer that question, I've never really played this game before.

condition.saying: this shape on the cards with my hands when I'm nervous in front of strangers

case.state: Hmmm... I'm not really sure what it means. Could it be some sort of signal for use on the battlefield?

condition.saying: Don't think I'm defenseless, just because I've taken off my sword

case.state: Don't forget that I am here Catria. If anyone tries to harm you, you have my word I will defend you.

condition.saying: You can afford to lose the round

case.state: Already giving up on this round before we even know the results? Have more faith in yourself Catria, I believe in you.

condition.saying: I must never bring shame to the Whitewings.

case.state: You know, if you get the chance I'd love to hear more about the Whitewings. Even today their... well, I mean your exploits are still legendary.
Pegasus knights like my sister really look up to the mythic Whitewings. I'm sure she'll be rather envious once she hears I got to meet one face to face.

condition.saying: Red is her favorite color. My favorite color is..

case.state: Your scarf as a memento of your sister? I inherited Falchion from my father... I don't think I would have made it this far if I got it from anywhere else.

condition.saying: Sometimes I go to sleep just in my tunic.

case.state: Due to the bleak conditions of my world, it was not uncommon for me to also sleep in the same clothes I wear on the battlefield.

condition.saying: But it wasn't that short when I got it!

case.state: You've had this uniform for a while now, haven't you? A wardrobe update couldn't hurt, could it?
If you would like, I would be happy to go shopping with you for a new tunic. I'm sure that I could pick something great out for you!

condition.saying: I just remembered Est saying

case.state: Your sister sounds like quite the prankster. Young, sparky, and no sense of boundaries. Just like my Aunt.

condition.saying: I'm paying you back for not telling me about my butt showing

case.state: I'm honestly quite surprised your family never let you know, What sort of sister wouldn't help a sibling in need?
Even though I've just met you, I can't help but be disappointed in your sisters as well.
This sort of prank seems exactly like something my Aunt Lissa would do.

condition.saying: It's like she wants to push me into marriage lately.

case.state: Oh? Excuse me for asking, but do you like anyone in particular? Just asking for the sake of curiosity.
If you don't mind me asking... were you to get married, what sort of person would you be interested in?

condition.saying: Now I finally understand why those cavalry jerks

case.state: It is an unfortunate truth that not knights manage to live up to their code of chivalry.

condition.saying: must have seen my butt too

case.state: He? Who is this man you speak of?

condition.saying: I'm persistent! Even without armor and bra.

case.state: Yes Catria, that's the spirit. Never give up!

condition.saying: On the battle field I fight for my life. Now I'm fighting for my panties.

case.state: Catria, I'll support you in this fight. A legendary pegasus knight such as yourself doesn't deserve to go down this easily!

condition.saying: That's gonna cost me my panties...

case.state: Never surrender, Catria! Even if all looks to be lost!

condition.saying: Preferable a prince from Altea

case.state: Altea? Wasn't the legendary Hero King Marth himself from Altea? (Could it be that...)
A prince from Altea? I think I'm starting to figure out who this mysterious man you keep talking about might be...

condition.saying: What should I t-take off next?

case.state: (She's giving up before the round has even ended? Poor girl...)

condition.saying: I wish I'd worn some pants, but well, those aren't part of the Pegasus Knight uniform.

case.state: Believe it or not, I've heard that Pegasus Knights from a land called Tellius wear pants... Maybe they are on to something.

condition.saying: forced into that ridiculous bunny outfit.

case.state: You had to be forced into wearing a bunny suit? Don't all girls enjoy wearing one to the spring festival?
Wait, you have a bunny suit... and you don't like it? I'm rather fond of mine...

condition.saying: My sister Fiora used to always look out for me, but I left because I wanted to grow into my own person. Is this how you do it, I wonder?

case.state: Florina, this game... probably isn't a common way to grow as a person, but I hardly claim to know much of your people's traditions.
Ah, another bad hand? Sorry to hear that Florina, it seems this game just wasn't yours to win.
Sorry to ask this, but you wouldn't mind staying around for a little while longer, would you? I was hoping we get to know each other a bit better.
Personally, I would choose a butterfly. It... represents the positive change I make in my fight against fate.
Favorite holiday? Oh, that's easy: the Spring Festival! You get to paint eggs, enjoy a communal feast, and dress up in adorable bunny outfits.
As of late, I've been enjoying going clothes shopping with my mother, and... simply doing anything with my father has truly been a joy to experience.
Not often, unless it's my turn to take up the role of night watchmen while the army makes camp.
My sword Falchion is inseparable from me... it a memento of my deceased father.
Ah! I recently acquired a rainbow-colored shirt covered with polka dot portraits of my father... It's charm has been called "subtle."
I have a preference for daisies, particularly white ones.
I... I can feel a heavy burden at times due to my responsibility to stop the Fell Dragon and save my world.
An odd question to say the least, but if you must know, when thinking it often takes the form of an internal monologue.
I... honestly can't remember the last time I got to sit down and enjoy reading a story. Gods, how old was I? 10? 11?
I've been told I was named after a certain species of butterfly. My name has given me strength on more than one occasion.
Treasure, I guess? I can't say I think about currency to nearly the same extent as you Annas do. I'm sure you know a lot more names for it than I do.
When it comes to siblings, I only have a single sister who... Excuse me, did you say five thousand? I knew there were many of you Anna sisters, but even still!
I... can't say I have, no. In fact, this is my very first time participating in such a game. Hopefully it isn't the last.
When I was younger, most of the cooking was merely done by the castle's servants. After that... well, it's best to say that we all cook together now.
I wouldn't say that I do a lot of cooking, but I do have some fond memories from back when I was a little girl of cooking delicious pies with my mother.
Hmm.... Oh, I know! My mother used to bake the most delicious pies when I was younger... I'll always have fond memories of them.
That... seems a bit dangerous. I'm afraid I must decline your gambit.
Incredible! A defensive ice barrier? This is just like Princess Fjorm's Ice Mirror spell.
Cryomancy? (Could Mei secretly be from Nifl?)
I could tell Mei was no ordinary human, but even I certainly wouldn't have guessed she knew ice magic.
Oh, so you are familiar with this game after all? Well then, that definitively makes things more interesting.
(Does this mean that Hilda has been holding back her true power this whole time? This game might be about to get intense.)
Ah, talk about an unexpected twist! Given your current condition, I certainly never would have guessed as such.
(Wait, if Hilda knows how to play poker, then how come a newcomer like me is doing so much better than her?)
Hey, Gwendolyn? This is a bit awkward to ask, but... do you know how those outrageous rumors of me being in a relationship with a guy called "Spiderman" started?
I don't see any reason as to why that would be the case. It's a beautiful gift, Estelle. I don't blame you for wanting to keep it close.
It's not decided yet Florina, don't give up!
(Looks like Florina is in trouble. Poor girl...)
If it makes you feel any better, Catria... you're hardly the only pegasus knight who has struggled with wardrobe malfunctions.
(Hmm... it seems Lady Palutena is in trouble, and I can't do a thing to aid her.)
Lady Palutena, are you alright? I didn't even think you could look so pale!
Ylisse is a beautiful kingdom with lush green fields. Life is brimming everywhere, even in the quietest of forests...It wasn't quite that way when I was growing up.
I can't say I have much experience with relationships, sorry. Due to the situation we've just been focusing on surviving more than anything.
I don't think you're supposed to announce it like that, but I suppose there isn't much point in hiding a certain victory.
Woah! This... dance. I suddenly feel... massively refreshed. Prepare yourself, I'm going to be giving this game all I've got!
Thanks for the dance, Shantae. I'm feeling reinvigorated just watching you!
This dance... yes! I feel as though I could make it through another round!
It's blue. Why do you ask?

state.text: I have slain hundreds of men and monsters alike with my sacred blade Falchion. It is not the life I would have chosen for myself, but fate is cruel.

case.state: I've... heard of the concept of sports... but I can't say I've ever had the chance to participate in one. Arena combat being the exception.
From what I understand, horse racing was quite popular before war ravaged my nation. Nowadays... there is no time for such frivolity.
Ramen sounds lovely... Though doesn't Captain Falcon like Ramen? I had best bring Falchion... just in case he shows up.
I apologize, but I don't understand the question. What exactly is this "cinema" you speak of?
I used to dream of soaring through the skies like a bird... and while traveling between worlds, I've actually met a few people who can do just that!
I've only had a chance to ask others about it. They have glass buildings that tower into the sky, horseless carriages, magic mirrors that can show their user anything...
I'm experienced with several different types of weapons such as the lance or bows, but if I had to pick just one... Falchion would easily be my preferred weapon of choice.
Bold words for so early into this game. You should know this; I will be putting my utmost effort into defeating you.
Hmm... that's not bad, I like it! I'll admit though that I'm not the best at this whole heroic title thing, that's more my cousin's area of expertise.
Nice and intimidating... I think it would suit you well, Leonie. If you want any more ideas, I get you in touch with my cousin. He's got a real talent for coming up with heroic titles.

To me, a great mercenary is experienced in the art of war, operates for reasons beyond simple profit, and sticks with their employer even when the situation is dire. Such qualities are sadly quite rare...
That's hardly the most abrupt marriage story I've heard. My parents got together because of pies! I had to outduel Father to wrest that story from him.
I've been touring the Outrealms, looking for aid. It's rather nice to find one that's not in a perilous state.
That sounds like some sort of hex. Perona, are you some kind of dark mage?
It's been a long time since I last saw you, Princess Estelle. I trust all is well?
L'Arachel, if it makes you feel any better, most people tend to fall for this disguise of mine.
Yes. I... uh... really wanted to tell you, but well...(Sometimes I wonder if choosing to disguise myself as a man was a bad idea.)
Indeed... Truth be told, I am starting to question the wisdom of pretending to be Marth.
Wearing gloves over my bodysuit isn't particularly difficult, Pit. It's a bit of a tight squeeze, but that helps to ensure that they don't slip off.
I... wouldn't know, sorry. I don't exactly have much romantic experience with men, or just in general for that matter.
Oh my, this wager of yours seems rather... dangerous.
Yes, I happen to have a close friend who doesn't get along well with her mother. It is... most unfortunate.
A story? Well, this could be an interesting enough distraction from all... this. Please proceed.
I have a friend named Brady who could be described as such. He may come off menacing at first, but he's very sweet once you get through his shell.
I know someone like that, although that's her getting sick, and more her own mother using her as a test subject for all sorts of... unfortunate hexes.
The book, Make Him Fall for You in a Fortnight, has been circulating around the camp. A passage mentions and shaving and much more to increase your attractiveness.
The mother of one of my friends appears small, yet she is over 1,000 years old! To her, a human lifespan is but a blink of the eye.
It's a bit of a long story, but I took the name Marth and fought against a Fell Dragon as a symbol of hope in my dying world.
W-wait? You know my real name? Mmmm... it seems we really have met in the past and I must have forgotten about it. My apologies.
After my Father’s murder and Grima's return, I took the name Marth and fought back. I still sometimes use the disguise to this very day.
Wait... really? Have I been playing this game wrong the whole time? I had thought the goal was to keep our clothes on...
(I bet she was spying on him while he was bathing... why do people keep doing that?.)
Though I fight to protect it, I am not involved in Earth affairs either, Meia. The Tempest, threatens the destruction of many worlds. I cannot ignore it.
No, not here... at least not yet. I oppose a being called Loki. She is an agent of chaos, corrupting worlds and treating their inhabitants as if they are her playthings.
... Fair enough. I will not force you or anyone else to aid me in my fight against the Tempest if they are not willing.
I've only ever seen one Lucario in all my time spent there, so it's got to be yours, right?
He's doing more than fine; he actually won the last tournament I participated in a few months back. You've raised a formidable opponent.
No, I've never been to Earth before myself. In fact... the world I hail from is in another universe entirely.
I'm not entirely sure what you mean by space travel, Jura. I travel between worlds using an Outrealm Gate, a portal network connecting worlds across time and space.
Yes, it's not that I have no interest in ever being in a relationship... it's just that for the time being, my responsibilities must come first.
Well... if I am being completely honest, I do actually have someone that I care for. I'm just waiting for the right time to confess my feelings to him.
Mundane? How so? Unless... Could it be that my world is simply lagging behind in the realms of magic and the useful arts?
Mundane? How so? Unless... Could it be that my world is simply lagging behind in the realms of magic and the useful arts?
Meia... in all honesty, I can't say for sure. I've only recently arrived here and haven't had the proper time to investigate the matter.
Meia, even if we are at an Earth, the question is then "which Earth". Each world throughout the Outrealms has nigh infinite variations of itself, mine included.
Florina, if you don't mind me asking, could you tell me a little bit about yourself?
A giant frog? Hmmm... I don't think there are any where I come from. ... Are they cute?
No, I haven't played before... I'm pretty sure I can count the amount of games I have played on one hand.
I once killed a Rathalos, a dragon of considerable power, though insignificant compared to the Fell Dragon. One day, I shall slay Grima with this very sword.
... I may have little experience with farming, but I don't recall seeing any nets used during the harvest season.
This is Falchion, a sacred blade forged from a tooth of the Divine Dragon Naga. It has been a family heirloom for countless generations.

condition.saying: Lucina... I would appreciate it if you did your best to not entice ~player~...

case.state: I'm not sure what you mean, Tharja? The whole purpose of this trip was to try and gain allies for our cause. Surely more allies for the Shepherds is something to be desired?
Cynthia... you mean to say the Lucario I've sparred with is a companion of yours? That's... incredible! He's doing quite well for himself, as far as I can tell.
I can't say I've heard this particular rumor before, but if I ever run into another Pokémon trainer, I'll be sure to set them straight if they bring the topic up.
As Chrom's daughter, I had no feats to my name... The Hero King of long past could overcome anything though. So, to inspire I took his mantle.
You know... Princess Laevatein... it seems we share some unfortunate similarities. I apologize for my initial reaction upon seeing you.
I would like to know as well, I've been relying on just the rations I've brought with me on this trip.
If you don't mind, can I accompany you? It's always exciting getting to try out food from other worlds.
It's our birthday today... I know she's out there, waiting for Father to return. I have to ensure that happens.
If anyone cares to know... today is my birthday. I'm curious how my younger self is doing today...
It... was, well... Your performance was quite satisfactory, and I'll not soon forget it. Us men really do appreciate seeing unclad ladies, after all.
Well, it was certainly rather distracting, and you definitely seemed to be enjoying yourself over there...
You really put on a good show there, Hilda. It's going to be hard to follow that up if I lose... All the more reason to not give up!

condition.saying: Phantom Thief

case.state: (Phantom Thief? So she works with Joker? I don't recall seeing anyone like her in his ensemble...)
Fancy meeting you here of all places, Leonie. It feels like just yesterday that I met you at the Hotrealm. It's not often that us warriors get a chance to relax at the beach.
It's fine, I guess... but my father's retainer hates it! I guess it's a bit of an acquired taste.
He he! I'm no slouch when it comes to training, but you remind me of my friend Kjelle. She has a constant drive to become stronger, I'm sure the two of you would get along.
No problem, Aella, it's a pleasure to meet you as well.
Hilda, pardon me, but I've heard that you craft accessories in your spare time? If it's not too much to ask, perhaps I could hire your services sometime?
I had been discussing with Claude about this "Flame Emperor" you've been fighting. I'm shocked that... perhaps I shouldn't say more. (I should watch myself. I don't want to disrupt her timeline.)
Apologies, I did not mean to distract from the game. It just has me thinking... (What if I invited him to play? Would it lessen the gap between us?)
That's against the rules? Fine, I'll respect them. (They can't stop me from challenging him after the game though...)
I've ended up at a beach... does it mean that this place is another Hotrealm?
My apologies... That may have been a bit of a overreaction. I'm.. less than fond of insects.
*Whew* It's even warmer at this beach than the last Hotrealm I visited.
I see this place is all decorated for the Winter Festival. Is it really that time of year already?
This place! I... wow! Is this the World of Steel the Summoner was telling me about?
I sure am thankful for the fireplace right now. I'd be rather cold without it!
An armory is certainly an odd place to hold a game such as this, but if this is where we will be playing I will not complain.
This library... there are so many books! Not even the royal Ylisstol collection can compete with this.
This is really where we want to play this game? City back lanes such as this can be a bit... unsanitary.
My goodness... I don't know exactly where we are right now, but wherever it is, it certainly is a beautiful sight.
Ah? So it's come to this, ~player~? Well... no matter what happens, I... want to let you know it's been a pleasure to meet you here today.
So this really is it, isn't it? May the best dualist win, ~player~!
Hey ~player~... if you don't mind me asking, you don't suppose we could spend a little bit more time together after this game ends?
Hey... ~opponent~...No matter how this game ends, no hard feelings, alright?
After we conclude this, would anyone like to venture outside with me and build a snowperson? I haven't had the chance to make one since I was a young girl.
Where I come from... we didn't often have the chance to celebrate festivals such as this very often.
These strange shiny buildings stretching high into the sky... the horseless carriages... this must be the Summoner's home, yes?
(Hmmm... now that I think of it, the way Itsuki and Tsubasa described their world seems rather similar to this as well. Could they be one and the same as the Summoner's?)
The amount of people here is... astounding. Is it normal to play a game such as this on such a crowded street?
Tell me ~player~, this is your world, yes? I'm no stranger to traveling between worlds, but I must admit that this is all new to me. After the game, perhaps you could give me a tour?
Oh! Sorry about that, I sometimes... find myself focusing on the negatives too much. For now, let us enjoy this game, alright?
I wonder if there are rare Regalia being stored here. Such legendary weapons could prove valuable to my cause.
We aren't disturbing the studying of any scholars by playing this game here... are we?
The only library I've ever seen larger than this is the Royal Askr library of Zenith. It's a marvel to behold, and it contains a collection of academic treasures from across the many worlds.
The smell here is... unpleasant, to say the least. I get that this area is secluded, but surely a better location could have been chosen.
In Naga's name! Be on your guard, everyone, I just saw a massive bug crawling underneath that bag over there!
Askr is a kingdom that uses gateways to secure aid from a variety of realms and worlds. Mages, scholars, and the like all collaborate within the kingdom's vast library, somewhat like this one.
That cathedral behind us is lovely; could it be Garreg Mach Monastery? No... it doesn't quite match the description Claude gave me.
This would be a lovely place to take a significant other on a date. Unfortunately, until my mission is completed, romance would likely only be a distraction from my goals.
That lattice-like iron tower in front of us strongly resembles... what was it... Prism Tower? Yes, that was its name, I'm sure of it.
I've actually... been knocked off of that tower before. Thank the Gods that death is but a temporary inconvenience in the Smash Realms.
It certainly looks like it's rather cold outside right now, but it's nice and cozy in here. I'm glad we can spend this time together tonight by the roaring fire.
Had I been able, I would have liked to have spent more time with my family celebrating these sort of holidays...
Some may dismiss the work of scholars, but I know of a collective of academics working together in Askr's library to find a way to save a cursed princess's life.
(Come to think of it, Robin spends a lot of time studying in Ylisstol's library when we aren't on the march. If I were to take up studying tactics as well, perhaps... )
Earlier, I was asked if I wanted to "blaze it up" for my birthday. Do you have any idea what they meant by that, ~player~?
Does my birthday align with any holidays in this world? The patrons here keep telling me to celebrate by "blazing it", whatever that means...
(I underestimated him. He's clearly a lot more cunning than he looks.)
I've always wanted to travel and see the world as it was before the Fell Dragon. Tell me, what's it like where you're from?
If any of you met your younger self, what would you do? I want to be there for her, but I don't wish for her to know her potential future...
My world was destroyed by the Fell Dragon, Grima. He's infested the lands by creating Risen from the corpses of the fallen, forcing us survivors to band together.
When traveling world to world, you never know who you may encounter. Wearing a mask ensures I have a clean slate no matter where I am.
When I returned to the past, I spent the first few years traveling alone. There were so many sights and scents I did not recognize. So many wonderful people.
I was sent to the past by the Goddess Naga. Reaching her was a perilous journey and it's unlikely we will get to try again if we fail to stop Grima.
I travel via a portal that leads to the Outrealms, a crossroads where all worlds are connected. It's incredibly easy to get lost if you aren't trained for it.
The kingdom of Ylisse is a beautiful kingdom devoted to upholding the will of Naga... It's also my home, and is destined for ruin.
I've had a great deal of encounters on this trip, but none have been as nonchalant as a friendly poker game. I'm just thankful to have not walked into another spontaneous battle.
It's a relief to find a place to rest that's so sociable and inviting. I'm used to camping alone during my travels.
It's unusual to play this game with a mask, isn't it? While I did forget to take it off... I think I'll keep it a moment longer. It is giving me an advantage after all.

My purpose here is rather straightforward: I've come seeking the aid of heroes from other worlds such as yourself to help me fight to save my own. If we work together, we can change my world's future... I'm sure of it.
Me, sing? No, I'm afraid not, that's more my sister's thing.
And Lyn will deserve it too. Honestly, I had expected better of her... aren't Saceans known to never lie?
Again with that, Bernadetta? It really is fine, you're hardly the first-
What exactly do you mean, Bernadetta?
Before any battle, I always remind myself what's truly at stake. Knowing the lives that are depending on me, I can't afford any hesitation.
Bernadetta... if you knew one of my weaknesses, would it make you stop with these comparisons?
What is it, Bernadetta? Something about you sounds a little different.
I never claimed to be good at poker, Bernadetta. I'm glad you're starting to see me for what I am.
Of course, I'd love to get to know you as well, Futaba.
Goodness, that's rather grim and...brutal, wouldn't you say? Besides, I lack the magical prowess to cast such a spell.
Futaba, could you possibly tone back your questions a little? I'd rather take a break from discussing violence.
Enough, Futaba! These questions are completely absurd, and you're not even listening to what I'm saying!
Actually, Futaba, why don't you tell me about yourself? I'm sure you've had all sorts of adventures that I can't even begin to imagine.
That sounds wonderful, but I'm not entirely sure if it's possible, Futaba.
I really would like to visit, Futaba. But don't you think a princess showing up would cause a stir?
I've had enough of this! What is it about my birthday that makes everyone try to give me strange herbs? What detail could I possibly be missing?

condition.saying: I generally expect

case.state: I can assure you, Jura, I am a warrior more than capable of holding his own both on and off the battlefield.
You... think I'm a bit small compared to other men you know? Oh... well, about that...
Excuse me? What have I ever done to you, Tharja? We may be in the same army, but we barely even know each other.
Tharja... you do remember that we are fellow Shepherds, yes? We're supposed to help each other, not fight among ourselves...
I'm... not sure what the issue is here, Tharja. Yeah, I briefly spoke to ~player~. So what?
Tharja... I thought we were allies. Have you rejoined Plegia and now oppose my father?
Estelle, I'm not surprised that you've never heard of it before, we are from different worlds after all. I would be happy to speak more with you later.

condition.saying: Hmm… Lucina, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.

case.state: I too find our circumstances to be oddly similar. I'd love to talk more about it with you, if you don't mind.
Heavy? No, not at all... Although I suppose I'm not the best judge of what is and isn't heavy. I seem to have inherited my father's exceptional strength.
I've gotten used to it, my mantle as a leader prevents me from being a normal woman anyways.
Upon reaching the past, I wished to aid my Father while minimizing the chance of him recognizing me.
For a time I didn't either. It took the last of Naga's power to send us back. It won't happen again, so we only have one chance to set things right.
I wear my uniform everywhere I go... Is there a problem with it, Elesa?
I'm um... I'm not sure that's the kind of question you should be asking me, Fate. There could be complications you're not prepared for.
This again... I'll tell you what I told the rest, I cannot afford to dull any of my senses, especially in these dire times! Gods, it's not even my birthday!
We already have a dancer in our ranks, Polly. Her movements inspire all of us to do better. Is that something you think you'd be capable of?
The benefits of wearing a mask far outweigh any desire I have for strangers such as yourself. No offense. I simply prefer a lasting relationship.
I simply had heard heroes from many different worlds congregated here, but didn't know why until just moments ago...
Lady Palutena? W-what do you mean by that?
Of course. How could I not with a Goddess watching?
L-Lady Palutena? Are you saying you want me to lose?
Well... if you want to see my face, I guess I can fulfill that request.
I know this is going to sound strange to you, but I wore it to protect those I care about.
Yes, L'Arachel?
Ah, the pleasure is all mine, Prince Miko.
I am unsure what my poor performance in this game has to do with my ability to lead my nation... Sigh
Me? Dashing? I... thank you, Miko.
Yes, Nami, I have been hiding something. Honestly though, I don't really see the point anymore. I'm here to socialize after all.
Yes, that mark you see in my eye in proof of the Ylissean royal family's covenant with the Divine Dragon Naga. I wore the mask to cover it.
Wait... Pit, have I never told you about it? I'm sorry, it must have slipped my mind,
You've probably heard of me before, Rinkah... I've traveled between enough worlds that my disguise hasn't been working as well as it once did. Anyway...
"They"? Who are "they", if you don't mind me asking?
Odin? Selena? Laslow? I... don't seem to know anyone by that name. Could you describe them to me?
The Shepherds are most certainly a diverse band of warriors, that is for sure. I'd like to think we all have our special quirks.
I'm not sure how I compare to this Selena, but I'd like to think I'm in pretty good shape. I do train almost every day, after all.
Rinkah... it's just, you're pretty strong. It's a bit embarrassing to show my body in comparison to yours.
It's Ylisse, but yes, I am. *sigh* ... Fine, I'll show you just how capable I am of taking risks.
Pigs? I'm sorry, why would I have to disguise myself from farm animals? No... it's not like that at all.
I don't think "costume" is quite the right word to describe my outfit, but I do appreciate the compliment. Anyway... on to removing more of it.
... Excuse me? What sort of question is that?
Oh, I lost? Well... I'm actually alright with that. Wearing this mask in the presence of Lady Palutena has been a bit awkward anyway.
I've lost this round? Ah well, I was looking for an excuse to remove this mask anyway. With Lady Palutena here... it seems a bit pointless.
I know how to relax, Lady Palutena, so I'm going to strip my boots. There's nothing sexual about that, is there?
Good. I feel much more comfortable continuing now that things have evened out.
I had all the right tools, yet it still was not enough?
I was feeling so good about this hand too... Can I keep it just a little longer?
I had a matching pair and still lost? It seems fate opposes me today...
Already bested? Clearly it was a mistake to take this game lightly!
I was to ease into this as Marth... But I suppose that was only an excuse to lower my guard!
It seems this game is rather unforgiving to beginners. I suppose there is only one way to learn.
Good, I feel a lot better about this now.
I know it's petty, but I really don't like losing.
No going back, is there? I must face the consequences or retreat...
So I must sacrifice something of my own if I wish to stay...
I think I see... Very well, I'll strip, but I won't make the same mistake again!
Breathe and move on...
It's a bit embarrassing to lose when the rules seem so simple...
Things are starting to get a little close for comfort aren't they? Don't worry, I'm not quitting now.
I'm lucky to have had so many chances already. I don't mind giving up the last of my clothing.
If I blamed luck, it would discredit the skill all of you have displayed. Well played.
Impressive...if not surprising...
So I've lost? Very well, it's only right to remove my mask then.
Fair's fair. I won't rob you of your victory just to maintain my persona...
(If I continue as Marth, I'll just be distancing myself from the others...) Very well, I'll remove my mask.
What do you mean you know who I am? Didn't I already... eh, never mind, I don't see much point in keeping this charade up any longer.
Resets Lucina's AI in case a target plays over the Ignatz line
Ah, I guess it's time to unveil my secret... to be honest I'm sure many of you know already.
... Oh, I lost? Well, I guess I couldn't remain fully clad forever.
I may have lost this round, but I won't let this setback change the fact that I plan on winning this game.

state.text: That's now twice in a row that I have failed…

case.state: T-this can't be happening! Has fate conspired against me?
T-this can't be happening! Has fate conspired against me?
H-how? Am... am I just that bad at poker?
... This isn't going very well, is it?
But... I'm already losing as it is.
*sigh* It seems I still have much to learn.
I-- Well, I suppose you're not exactly wrong. Do you have reason to suspect such treachery here? I can protect you if that's a concern.
Even the most of steadfast of us have fears, Bernadetta. I can't count how many times I've lost sleep fretting over the Fell Dragon's might.
You say that, Bernadetta, but you've yet to run away today, despite being afraid. I don't think you'd run when it truly counts.
It's large bugs, Bernadetta. It may be ridiculous, but I often lose my composure around them.
And should a fight break out, you'll keep me covered from the back, right?
Exactly! Every member of an army is a valuable asset who is not to be undervalued. You've got plenty of stron-
That's... oddly specific.(Would that even be possible?) I have taken down foes twice my size, but it's never been that... extreme...
There are many in the army who are that proficient in magic, but they are vulnerable up close. In moments like those I have leapt in to save-
Why wouldn't I simply negotiate with the King in such a circumstance? Kidnapping seems a bit extreme.
I... should be apologizing too. I thought I was getting better with my temper, but there's still a ways to go. I'm still not really used to talking to others.
I can't imagine someone with your amount of character having nothing of interest to say. Surely your passion has to come from somewhere.
I'm only exploring other worlds to find a way to save my own. To use the Outrealms after that... I'd just be meddling without good cause.
I've always dreamed of getting to live a normal life even if only for a day... Why not? I'll visit you, Futaba. It's a promise.
That's uncalled for, Tharja.
You know, I already knew Noire's mother was a bit... off, but interacting with you in person is proving to be most unpleasant.
You... could say that, yes. It was a gifted to me by a friend who happens to be quite fond of masks himself.
Female? Your device is quite perceptive, Chihiro.
Indeed, it doubles as armor of a sort. My mask once protected my face from what have likely been a lethal slash.
Catria, these clothes were based on historical records of the Hero King's regalia. It's a miracle we were able to put it together with what we had.
It's surprisingly comfortable, and it certainly has helped keep me warm on many an occasion.
Yes, we did look great wearing capes together, didn't we?
Not manly, you say? Well, about that...
Me, a hero? Until I manage to save my world and slay Grima... I don't think I'm worthy of the title.
Thanks, Shamir. I'm sad to see it go.
My form has always helped me with the Marth ensemble. I don't really understand the expectations of others.
Tharja, I am unsure what I have done to earn your wrath. Can you please explain the cause of your anger?
The battle we are fighting is of grave importance. Even if there's someone I long for, I wouldn't want him changing our tactics to give me special treatment.
Regardless of what I want, I don't think it would be right to ask anything more of those by my side. He already has so much to think about...
Blackmail? No, nothing like that. I'm just here due to an Outrealm trip going... not exactly as I had foreseen. I could really use a rest.
You may think that, but I've found that danger can lurk in unsuspecting places.

condition.saying: I've been meaning to ask you,

case.state: Oh... about the blue. My outfit is directly based on the Hero King Marth's regalia. Our archives say it was blue, therefore mine is too.

condition.saying: I've been wondering about your color

case.state: I wouldn't say that blue has any sort of special significance to me... but I would be lying if I didn't admit that it was my favorite color.

condition.saying: So, Lucina… are you at all interested in women? A friend wants to know.

case.state: W-w-what? I-interested in women? What business does your friend have in asking a personal question like that?
The mark on my eye proves my family lineage. A mask hides it well, especially from potential enemies I meet on my travels.
I understand if it looks strange to you, but this is simply how my ancestor dressed. Though his confidence and his power, I am able to inspire those who rely on me.
There's nothing wrong with it. It's just that the answer might disappoint you... I'm not the man you think I am.
That wasn't a strike against your character, it's just I'm on the road and- wait, did you say two relationships? It's not really my business, but I expected you to be more... seasoned?
Step on them? That sounds painful. Why would anybody want me to do something like that?
I... doubt that, Dust. As far as I know, we've never met.
Hmmm... Well... when you live your life as a warrior while on the march, you can't really afford to skimp on essentials.
Oh... uh, yes, Estelle. This will be my underwear.
(Oh dear... this is more awkward than I anticipated.)
Well... the mask was due to me attempting to keep my influence on the timeline as minimal as possible... oh, I suppose that itself needs an explanation.
That may be so Miko, but I intend to keep it nearby regardless... just in case.
It's... oddly more exciting than normal to do this, Miko.
My sword is a treasured family heirloom, and I will not easily part from it.
Nami... I've been in life or death situations fighting against overwhelming odds... this is more about pride than anything.
I have my Father's training to thank for that. You're a force to be reckoned with yourself, you know?
Ah... you're not still upset about that loss, are you? Me sending you into an early free fall did seem to swing the match in my favor.
Oh, about the mask, Rinkah... you're not wrong that the Hero King never wore one.
Huh? That sounds just like my cousin, Owain. He has a brand in his... You don't suppose he's been using an alias, like I was earlier?
Retainers of foreign royalty from another world? How could they possibly know about me then?
They sound like interesting people, I'd... one moment, this is a bit difficult to undo... Anyway, what was I saying? Oh! Yes, I would like to meet them sometime.
I'm starting to be convinced this Selena is the Severa I know... she wore a bodysuit underneath her outfit much like my own.
Well... we clearly come from different cultures. I suppose I'll be living like a princess of the Flame Tribe today.
I'm fine with facing down undead warriors, but I'm really starting to lose here. It's only natural things are going to get more tense.
Favorite... character? You must be confused. I can assure you that the Hero King was a real person, we have extensive historical records documenting his life.
Anime dress up? I have no idea what that is. No, this is how I normally dress. It's functional, stylish, and inspires hope in the army I help lead.
Yes, my sword is real, I can assure you of... Wait, are you saying that swords aren't legal in the world you hail from? How curious.
I'm afraid this face reveal might... disappoint you, Weiss.
I'll try to, yes. It was rather... awkward, to say the least. Maybe the mask disguise isn't such a good idea after all.
Don't take it personally, Weiss. It's fairly normal for me to disguise myself like that when traveling to unfamiliar locations.
I think I can manage by myself, Catria, but I do appreciate your offer.
Pit, as much as I appreciate the offer, I doubt Father would approve of you helping to divest me of my bodysuit. Even if you are an angel.
(I hope she's just being playful. The last thing I need is the disdain of a Goddess...)
And I'd rather be judged by the Goddess in my most modest state. As myself, not the hero I strive to be.
Jokes...? Perhaps you could share them with me at some point.
I am... not used to undressing with so many people around, but I think I can manage it.
I am... not used to undressing with so many people around, but I think I can manage it.
I am... not used to undressing with so many people around, but I think I can manage it.
There are so many unique fashion styles being worn by the people here... ~Player~, once this concludes, I'd love it if you could take me to the town market.
I'll admit my bodysuit is not suited for this warm weather. We normally traverse through the cold, even when in the deserts of Plegia, where it's best to move at night.
Last time I was at a Hotrealm, I had heard that they had a nudist beach. Still odd that they would divide a beach like that.
Apologies for concealing my identity. I never know who I may encounter when traveling outrealm- caution is prudent.
I'm aware my identity isn't the best kept secret, but I did manage to trick my Father.
My mask is modeled after a butterfly, a rare creature that symbolizes hope where I am from.
What a shame. My sister tells me that I look heroic in this cape.
I'm actually far more nimble without my cape, but I've been told that it inspires the troops around me.
My outfit was designed to replicate what the Hero King wore generations ago. We had no records of a cape, but my cousin insisted on its inclusion.
Right, the next thing to remove should be my boots. My feet have been starting to ache.
When you walk for miles on end, it can be easy to start neglecting your body. I promised I'd start taking better care of myself.
"If ya don't know when ta quit en rest, ya might be stuck on yer keester the next day."
Forgive me if I'm a little wary. It's not uncommon for us to be ambushed at night.
Supposedly people wearing gloves have something to hide, but I simply wear them to better handle my blade.
My ally Inigo seems to think that I need protective gloves to preserve the beauty of my hands...
My gloves are getting somewhat worn out. Perhaps I should get a new pair when I next go to the market with Mother.
Excuse me if this takes a moment, there are quite a few things I need to remove.
Marth was actually my ancestor, but I'll spare all of you the lineage. It's rather convoluted.
This is the last piece of my Marth ensemble...It's always a bittersweet feeling taking it off.
I'm not really sure how Marth would have approached this situation... or if he would have approached it at all.
Everyone changes by themselves in their own tent, well, besides the couples... Needless to say, this is unusual for me.
I really only get to remove this bodysuit when I'm off duty. Sometimes I even sleep in it.
Am I to sulk while the competition is still going so strongly? That would hardly be appropriate.
I don't usually have fun when I'm losing. It's been nice to simply enjoy something for what it is, without worrying about the details.
When I first experienced the deserts of Plegia, it was not uncommon for me to train shirtless.
There's advantages to having a rather small bosom, such as being able to fit into armor without tight undergarments.
I may not dress in feminine garb, but I still have all of the attributes of a woman.
Not fooling anyone? But... I thought I was playing the role pretty well today.
I'm not sure what you mean, Shamir. This is Falchion, the same sword wielded by Marth himself, is it not? Sure, it's been re-forged, but...
Parallel Falchion? You know about the failed Rite of Awakening? How?
Lucina? It seems you know quite a bit about me, stranger. How did you come by this information?
Really? But it worked on my Father... Ah! You knew who I was this whole time, didn't you?
Wait, you already know my name? Did some allies of yours tell you of their meeting with me in Askr?
In my experience, the back line are the ones keeping the front manageable. That's hardly dead weight, Bernadetta!
But you have saved others before, right? Even if it was only once, you made a difference, Bernadetta!
Protecting others is the duty I mind the least, Bernadetta. I promise you it's no extra inconvenience.
I can't really argue against that... but still, that's no reason to be putting yourself down.
See? There's something you're actually better at than me. And there's plenty more, I promise you.
I was joking, Bernadetta! Gods, maybe I do need to practice my wit...
Bernadetta, while I'm happy for you, that wasn't an invitation to start boasting.
I suppose? I don't like taking the credit for any enemies we bring down. It disregards all the hard work my allies put in.
That's not what I was going to- sigh. No, Futaba. That hasn't happened before.
That's even worse! Even if the goal was noble, it would set a terrible example for generations to come!
I don't mind conversing with you, or even answering your questions. Just please, keep it reasonable.
I'd love to hear either, Futaba. You have my ear when this game is finished.
You're... Not exactly wrong, Futaba. Still, let me think about it, okay?
Goodness, I've gotten you riled up and talking about strange things again... I suppose I should get used to this.
Well... if you two are already naked, I suppose that's a good enough excuse. Just don't tell Father, OK?
Wait, what? No! Catria, I'm a woman and my name is Lucina. I'm not really... wait, are you even listening? Hello?
I-I'm not actually prince Marth. Just who are you fantasizing about, Catria?

condition.saying: Oh, no need to be ashamed, Lucina. There are Pegasus Knights in Macedonia that wear even less than that as uniform...

case.state: Catria, the difference between me and them is that this is my underwear, not my uniform.
Huh? There are pegasus knights where you come from that wear less than this as their uniform? Do they even have any armor at all?

condition.saying: Wait! You are really that flat? How can someone even smaller than me be so popular?

case.state: Huh? A-are you saying that I'm popular? With whom? And... why?
I'm... I'm popular? Wait, what does my... lack of size have anything to do with popularity?

condition.saying: What? So that wasn't some special breast binding technique after all? No wonder I mistook you for a guy...

case.state: It has it's benefits. Hiding the fact that I'm a woman might have been a tad too easy...
Due to... highly unusual circumstances back in my own world, I felt it best to hide my identity as a princess. It's become a bit of a habit when traveling.
W-wait? You know my real name? Mmmm... it seems we really have met in the past and I must have forgotten about it. My apologies.
Y-yes, it seems quite a few awkward things have been said. Uhh... sorry?
Honestly, I'm surprised you didn't figure it out until just now...
Casual wear? I mean, I'm quite happy wearing this in my own quarters, but the castle maids insist that it isn't proper in the presence of others.
Fancy? I wouldn't really say that... although it is rather comfortable to wear.
Lingerie? No... this is a modest undergarment with an emphasis on being practical and comfortable... not some showy under-thing.
W-what? No... you've got it all wrong... I mean, yes... it's to disguise the fact that I am royalty, but not like how you are thinking.
It's... difficult to explain. Suffice to say, by being "Marth", I can better focus on my mission while in a world I do not belong in.
... How can you say that when your choice in underwear is apparently nothing but a pair of skimpy knickers?
Yes... To be blunt, this game has not exactly gone as I had envisioned it.
Megumin, are you saying that princesses disguising themselves is becoming a trend... and you've met another one prior to me?
Ah... Ping, that's a long story. Perhaps I could explain why I chose to disguise myself like that later?
I do admit that the odds of multiple women coming here disguised as men does seem rather low, I've personally never met another until just now.
It's fine, Pit. Losing is my responsibility. Please, enjoy your win.
Me? Hate you? Pit... However this game ends, I'm still happy to have you as my friend.
Are you saying you're distracted without any of your clothing? Careful, Pit. I might take advantage of that.
Oh Gods, you're right! He'd hack you up, pummel you, and spike you so hard you'd never come back!
Oh Gods, you're right! If he knew what you did in front of me, you'd probably never fly again even with Lady Palutena's blessing!
Same here... my father would be rather... displeased if he found out what has occurred tonight.
I... I can't believe I'm saying this, b-but if it helps you out, I won't mind. You are a valued friend, after all...
I... can't say I'm aware of any such laws. There are multiple non-royals in the Shepherds led by my Father who wear capes without issue.
To the best of my knowledge, no such law exists in my nation. Anyone is welcome to wear a cape, as long as they can afford one.
What a strange rule Fodlan has. In Ylisse, anyone is welcome to wear a cape, if they desire. I personally know several commoners who wear them as a part of their regular outfit.
I know when to surrender, Weiss, and now is not the time. If I wish to win, this is simply what I must do.
Weiss! I'm already losing. You don't need to be such a poor sport.
I... uh... thanks Catria, I guess?

condition.saying: L-Lucina? ... Was taking ~player~ away from me not enough for you?
