case.state: Take... away... ~player~? I honestly have no idea what you are talking about, I just met ~player~ mere moments ago. Do you two know each other somehow?
...Huh? Tharja? What's gotten into you? You're treating me like I'm suddenly your enemy.
Don't you think you are being a bit overdramatic about this?
I am unsure of why my gender matters so much to you, but I look forward to playing this game with you as well.
Thank you, Leonie. A tactician I happen to be... close friends with tells me that I tend to be too hard on myself. I'll try to do better!
Believe it or not, I have no real desire to make a name for myself. In fact, when I manage to save my world, I'm actually planning on fading into obscurity.
I thank you for not giving me away, Leonie. Old habits do indeed die hard.
Thank you for humoring me, Leonie. Old habits do indeed die hard.
I... I come from my world's future, and as someone who has no place in the past, I wore it to... minimize my involvement with those I care about.
Fantasy setting? I'm not quite sure what you mean by that... but I can tell you that I do come from a different world than the one you live in.

condition.saying: I think it was... Some guy who kept trying to hit on me... Laslow?

case.state: Some guy that was hitting on you? I happen to be friends with a notorious flirt named Inigo, but I've never heard him call himself Laslow before.

condition.saying: I think it was... some bratty redhead... What was her name? Selena?

case.state: I happen to be very close friends with a red headed girl named Severa. She does have a rather sharp tongue... could you possibly have just gotten her name mixed up?

condition.saying: What was his name? The guy who was always shouting... Odin?

case.state: Well, I happen to have a cousin named Owain who can be rather... theatrical. He's always making up stories and yelling and the like.
I don't see reason to hide it from any of you. I am Lucina, Princess of Ylisse.
I um... didn't quite mean to say that. Besides, do you really think looking more feminine would actually help?
There's some complications that are not worth going into... Would changing how I'm perceived really make a difference?
You suddenly sound a lot more serious than just a few moments ago. Apologies for my rude remarks, I'd love to hear more.
I'm not sure why you'd slander me like that, Lady Palutena. I'm simply here to unwind like everyone else here.
I fail to see how simply following the rules of the game makes me a pervert. You're doing the same, are you not?
I would have to remove my bodysuit in order to show my arms... and for the time being, have no intention of doing that!
While I do appreciate the offer, I need to keep it close by... just in case.
Awww... you like them too? They're designed to be practical, but there's something about their look I am attached to.
Aww... thanks Lady Palutena, you're the best.
You know what? I am. I don't think I would have ever played something like this before meeting people like you.
Anna... is dead? Wait! Which Anna are you referring to? I've met several while traveling the Outrealms...
Ah, thanks. I'd like to think that I make quite the actress while being "Marth".
Thanks, it's also an honor to meet a clearly skilled warrior such as yourself.
Oh? If you must know, the Exalt of Ylisse comes close to being an absolute monarchy, but even royalty is bound by the covenant made with the Divine Dragon, Naga.
Yes, I am a princess of the proud nation of Ylisse. My father is the Exalt.
I'm not sure what this Legend you are talking about it... but I have fought against a princess named Zelda who used magic to disguise herself as a male warrior.
It's fine Estelle, no offense taken.
Yes, I am indeed a princess. My apologies for the deception.
Yes... My world was set to ruin by the Fell Dragon Grima and his army of monstrosities. Has yours suffered a similar fate as well?
You flatter me, L'Arachel.
Me? A legendary hero? I doubt I can truly live up to the moniker, but I do aspire to follow in the ways of the Hero King Marth.
A... giant sock? Well, I suppose the comparison is rather apt, now that you mention it. It's not really supposed to be worn by itself...
Immodest? How so? My sister told me that my choice in underwear was considerably more chaste than what most women wear.
I appreciate the sentiment, L'Arachel. But it really isn't that much of an issue.
Yes... Truth be told, I don't think my disguise would work if I had a large bust.
Oh? Actually... yes. Lucy just so happens to be my sister's favorite nickname for me.
I see no reason to assume Falchion is the lesser blade. We could put your theory to the test in a mock battle after the game ends, if you wish.
Another thing we have in common, I guess. If our busts were larger, I doubt our disguises would have worked.
Oh? Misato, if you don't mind me asking, what are bodysuits like in the world you come from?
You all have nothing to fear from me, Nami, unless you give me a reason to use my blade. My goal is to protect people, not harm them.
I sometimes get the feeling that the person I like might be more interested in women with more... generously sized proportions.
Oh, my gloves? They're just like that to be fashionable...
You misunderstand. My armor is merely a recreation based on historical records. His outfit was lost sometime over 1,000 years ago.
...Yes, this is my underwear. I hail from a land called Ylisse. You've probably never heard of it, I doubt we are even from the same world.
It's nice to see you too, Pit. It's been a while since we last faced each other... although this does seem to be a... different form of competition.
What? I'm not sure what you mean, Pit. I'm still fully dressed, am I not?
Oh, my apologies, I've been told that most jokes fly right over my head... Er, was that a poor choice of words?
Thank you, Pit. I appreciate the sentiment, truly.
I still have many ways to improve... But thank you, Pit. You've always been sweet, even in the midst of fierce competition.
If he has a mark like mine, we must be related. It's unique to our bloodline.
Arthur... I remember my sister mentioning wanting to start a hero association with a man of that name while we were all in Askr!
Well, if you ever get the chance, I'd love for you to properly introduce them to me.
(I might need to avoid future loses. I'm not sure if I can compare to Rinkah's abs...)
That's got to be Severa, I'm sure of it now! She's always had a bit of a complex about her bust... I think it runs in her family.
That... does rather sound like the Princess Camilla I've met. For being royalty... her outfit is rather scandalous.
Nerds? I can't say I'm familiar with the term. Would you care to explain its meaning to me?
Well... if nothing else, this means I had a pretty effective disguise, yes? Anyway, it's in the past now, we need not speak more of this.
(Is... she saying I'm not cute? Is this why he hasn't... )
Falchion was something I inherited from him... when he died... But no use dwelling on that now that we are reunited. Still, he shouldn't know about this.
Rumors? What for? You were merely offering to help me undress.
That... seems like a rather misguided form of worship. Is that really what some people are praying for?
That's a valid point... Now that I don't have to lead the army alone, maybe it finally is time to try a new look.
Just to be clear, I'm not donating Falchion to the collection here. I'll need it back once the game concludes.
It isn't as cute as my actual swimsuit, but I guess my underwear will work well enough.
That bed is starting to look quite comfortable.
He's an odd one, but I can scarcely imagine anyone who can match his knowledge on folklore.
Morale is a precious commodity in my world. If donning a cape truly helps my allies, I have no reason to complain.
Feeling its weight reminds me of all the lives that depend on me... I confess there is a sense of relief when I remove it.
That was until a rather disgruntled mother told me not to. Apparently that's considered indecent in this time period.
My friend gave it to me, saying he didn't need it anymore. It's served its purpose, but I can't bring myself to get rid of it.
Gods, he really does make his lectures memorable. I hope Brady is taking care of himself back home.
Oh! Surely they must sell clothing here, yes? I wonder if I can find a worthy memento, perhaps something with a card pattern on it?
Can you believe the priorities on that one? He even cracks jokes when he gets injured in battle. I almost wish I could comprehend it.
I hope I still look like a capable leader just as I am... I don't have any great feats or legends to call my own.
I'm unsure if someone like me should even be playing this game. Forgive me if I've burdened you all.
Perhaps proper introductions are in order. My true name is Lucina, Princess of Ylisse.
Masquerading as Marth is rather nostalgic. Still, in the interest of going forward, you should know me as Lucina.
There are no guarantees of victory in war… nor in poker, it would seem. Let us carry on.
Hmm... I suppose this means I'll be settling down for the day. I should find a place to rest.
It feels somewhat strange, staying half dressed like this. Let's keep up the pace.
Good, my grip on Falchion remains firm.
I look forward to the day when I can finally let my guard down for good.
I'm impressed you've pushed me this far. I wasn't expecting to play for this long.
Let's get on with the game, shall we? I believe this is the part where things are supposed to get exciting.
It's... rather nice though. I wouldn't mind doing this more often.
Look at me, prattling on about my evenings. This game is about the present, is it not? Let's enjoy it.
~Player~, it's a little embarrassing when you stare at my chest like that. I know I'm in good shape, but I'm not here to show off.
Walking around like this, I'm starting to see why Vaike is so confident.
It's becoming more common for Smash contenders to fight without any sort of top. Do you think I could pull it off, ~player~?
This is what you came here for, is it not, ~player~?
Here I stand, with nothing but the skin on my back. It's all instinct from here!
From here on out, I have no extra chances to rely on. Prepare to face me at my best, ~winner~!
Invisible line to change Marth to Lucina.
I'm unsure why, but you remind me of a tactician I know back in my world. He is... very important to me.
The fact that he can talk is news to me too. I don't think I've ever heard him speak a word up until now...
Link may be a man of few words, but I can assure you that he is a very kind hearted and heroic young man. I'd be able to depend on him on the battlefield.
He was still playing that round? That isn't fair! He was worried about something far more important!
... Was it just me, or did we just hear Link say intelligible words?
(Yusuke reminds me a lot of Father, only more... stiff? It must be coincidence. Father entrusted me to travel alone...)
(His voice is a bit deeper, but I can definitely hear a resemblance.)
(Okay...Okay. I simply have to ask him a question. That should clear things up.)
Seriously, Father? I find it offensive that you'd dress as a strange man just to keep an eye on me!
I pray you can forgive me, Yusuke. I imagine that wasn't just embarrassing for me...
My hair color? It's been a common color within the royal family for countless generations... And it's not even that uncommon outside of it.
A point against the Captain.
Captain, I can't say I'm sorry to see you lose.
Ahem, You'll get no sympathy from me, Captain.
Wait... Florina, you don't want ~name~ here? That's not a very nice thing to say to someone you just met...
~Target~, there are a lot of weapons in this place. If either of us has to remove our blade, we should take care nobody mistakes it as being part of the collection.
I think we might be distracting him just a bit, Leonie.
With so much of our bodies on display, it seems he is having a hard time concentrating on his cards. I wonder if we could apply this to combat somehow?
Florina, why do you appear so worried? You do know you're not the one who has to strip, yes?
If I understand the rules right, this means you need to take a piece of clothing off.
I'm sorry, but from what I was told about how things work here, you'll need to remove an article.
Well, it seems I'm off to a good start here.
I know it's only the first round, but this game's result is already looking promising for me.
I'd say we've all earned this victory against, ~name~. What's he going to give us for it?
I await your decision, ~name~, whatever it may be.
No need to look so downtrodden, ~name~. We all played with the same rules.
I shouldn't laugh, but ~name~'s reaction is just so endearing!
Rise up, ~name~. I know you can do better!
Well, you lost, ~name~. You know what you must do now, correct?
I might have tried a little too hard there. Apologies, ~name~.
Father... I won!
Considering my cornered state, you should have exercised more caution, ~name~.
Father... I won! Actually, please don't tell him a word about this, okay?
Don't take it too hard, I've lost my fair share of rounds and I'm still standing!
There we are! Another round secured. At this rate I might be able to turn this game around!
~Name~? You're not losing focus are you? I need you to be at your best!
The competition is only going to get more fierce, how will you adapt, ~name~?
Don't take me lightly just because I'm out of my armor, ~name~!
I intend to rewrite history, ~name~. Besting you is trivial by comparison!
So, are you going to give me something more to work with here?
Oh, well, this should be interesting,
Could you make this something special I won't forget, ~name~? I've got a long road ahead...
The only time we see men undress is after battle, and this usually isn't what's on my mind...
If you ever wanted to impress a princess, ~name~, now's your chance...
It's normally bad...hah... form to root for someone's defeat... But today's hardly a normal day for me.
I'm not even going at full speed, ~name~... Think you can give me some motivation?
Go on, ~name~. I'm sure it'll be great...
You have the chance to make an impact on me, ~name~...
You got to see a princess strip herself naked, now it's time that you return the favor.
Ah, it seems you lost ~name~. Show us something good, OK?
Keep this up and you'll be joining me in the losers club before you know it.
I think I'm starting to see the benefits of just sitting back and being a spectator...
It's your turn now ~name~. Show us something interesting.
You're not getting away, ~name~. Not after seeing the things you've seen!
Come, ~name~. You've been clothed long enough.
Whatever it takes... I will win this game.
I don't think you're quite ready to stand up to the Hero King, ~name~, but I commend your courage.
I do not find you any less capable as a result of this defeat, ~name~.
How does someone like ~name~ handle defeat, I wonder?
A loss for ~name~, and not a single scratch on me.
Maybe this is a bad time to mention this, but for some reason you remind me of my dear friend Robin. Curious...
I too am glad that I have had the chance to meet you two. It always gives me hope seeing a strong duo.
Lyndis, is this really how you treat your friend? Surely she deserved to know about this...
Wait, is lady Catria famous? This is the first I've heard of her.
Has the Order of Underwear Knights already have to be disbanded? I thought it was a cute idea...
So long Order of Underwear Knights, your cuteness shall be dearly missed.
Wait, you're not going to run away again, are you?
Florina... I had hoped that we were past this by now.
Come now Florina, Pegasus Knights don't run from danger, remember?
Oh! Florina, you know Ninian? I must say I agree, her outfit resembles Ninian's dress a great deal.
Ninian? I met a girl in Askr who went by that name, she was a dancer of much grace and beauty.
I... don't really understand Moon either. She's a strange girl... and that's putting it very lightly.
This game has got to be rigged, nobody could lose this many times in a row, right?
If you don't want to remove your breastplate, I'm sure you can find something else to substitute it.
Last time someone tried to use a snapshot tome this way, people got very upset. Are you sure you can be doing this, Streaming?
That's a real shame, you looked so cute in that spring outfit.
Well Florina, you may have lost this round, but at least you had a good run while down to your underwear.
Florina, I know it's scary, but I believe you can do it! We'll be back to being dressed in no time, promise!
Sorry Florina, it looks like you'll be joining me in the no-top club. You'll be back to being dressed in no time, promise!
Yes, I hate to say it but Florina has little chance of winning at this point. Surely we can let her simply forfeit, yes?
"Like"? No Florina, Lady Palutena is much more than just "like" a goddess...
Florina, h-how do you keep losing like this?
Errr... could we give Florina a mulligan, just this once?
Oh dear... Florina's undergarments didn't even stand a chance...
Yes, it would certainly appear you've experienced a bit of bad luck.
I don't know, I think undressing with the men isn't that bad. It's actually a good opportunity to strike up conversation.
You don't have anything on underneath that leotard, do you?
Wait, what? No, it wasn't! I swear it Florina, I know of no such plot.
Well, it looks like that bunny suit is finally meeting its end...
A bee? Stay away from her, foul insect!
Relax Florina, you've got a whole lot left to remove before you starting worrying about being nude.
Florina, if you win you might not join us... and at this rate I'd say your odds are looking pretty solid.
Oh no! You lost already... *sigh* Florina, I really do feel sorry for you right now.
I'm sorry Florina, but I think it's fair that you join us in removing something. It isn't that bad. Honest.
Oh dear... even though I want to win, I had been hoping you would be able to wear your underwear at least a bit longer than that...

condition.saying: Wanna brawl later?

case.state: Noodle arms? Hilda, you say that like I haven't seen you swinging a giant steel axe around with no issue in the slightest.
To the best of my knowledge, there are no practice rounds in this game, Ms. Goneril. You know what you must do.
Florina, are you afraid of men or... wait, what are you doing?
(Didn't mother tell me not to show too much skin around men I didn't know? I don't see what the issue is?)
Hmmm... it seems this game pulls no punches when it comes to punishing the losers.
I... I hate to say this, but yes, you do Florina.
It looks like yet another hero will be losing the entirety of their clothing.
I suppose you've never met him, but you've already gotten this far in front of him, and he hasn't acted too out of line. If he does, he'll have to answer to me.
I suppose that works. Think of it as a way to show that you aren't afraid of men like you say you used to be.

condition.saying: I haven't even undressed once and yet you all have more clothes

case.state: Wait, you don't have 8 articles of clothing to remove? That hardly seems fair...

condition.saying: The rule that the player in lead has to strip two things is made up by Princess Minerva

case.state: I can't recall any rule like that being stated before we began this game. It seems this princess of yours plays by some... unorthodox rules.
B-b-bee! The bee is back! Wait... Florina, watch out!
Again? How does that thing keep coming back when it's your turn? It's like it knows things that shouldn't be possible for a bee to know!
I'm sorry, Florina, but in the interest of being fair I really can't hold back... even if I am against you.

condition.saying: I wanted to keep it for someone special...

case.state: Not to pry, just may I ask just who that may be? No pressure, of course.
That's the spirit! Show us what you've got.

condition.saying: Um, I'd rather keep my dress on, th-thanks.

case.state: Florina, I hate to say this, but unless you quit, keeping your dress on simply isn't an option.

condition.saying: Aww... I was so happy being the only one still in her panties.

case.state: This game is coming down to sudden death... Good!
(Now that she mentions it, is this really the type of game a princess should be playing?)
I for one would have no problem with letting you keep them on, but unless the others here can agree to that as well... I'm afraid they likely have to go.
Sorry Florina, but the rules here do seem pretty clear about how this game is supposed to work.
Nayru! Behind you! Oh Naga, it's too late...
What manner of foul sorcery is this?!?
Still as gracious in defeat as ever, Lady Palutena... Well, except for when you lost to the Hero...
There's the confidence of the Goddess that us mortals all aspire to. Even if she is a little crass.
Oh dear. If this keeps up, People might start questioning your Godhood, Lady Palutena.
Lady Palutena lost again? And here I was at the beginning of the match thinking I had no chance of beating her...
How ironic that a goddess and a human are in the same predicament.
Lady Palutena, you may be falling a bit behind, but I still believe in you. You are a genuine Goddess, after all.
Removing the crown from a Goddess would be too much... So that just leaves...
Transparency? You can do that? Oh... sorry, bad timing.
If a mortal like me can do this, surely a Goddess like yourself can manage too, yes?
Claude can be quite the schemer, from what I've heard. Perhaps... perhaps you played right into his hand?
Ms. Goneril, from what I know of Claude, you don't suppose that... you were the one being fooled all along?
Florina, it's only a game of cards. Why are you fidgeting so much over a loss?
Well, it's your turn again Florina. Maybe you should try your gloves next?
You've still got a few good options left Florina, I'm sure you'll find something you can safely part with.
Good job Florina, I see you've already become a braver person.
Sorry about this Florina... at least you still have a dress on underneath your tunic?
(Seeing Florina like this hurts to watch... that poor girl.)
I don't know what to say Florina... sigh do your best to stay strong.
Florina, you don't need to panic. Remember, it's just one article of clothing, alright?
Sorry Catria, but it's only fair you joined us in removing something.
Come, Catria! It's quite comfortable, I promise you!
If a princess like me can go topless, I'm sure you can too. It's really not that embarrassing.
(Time for the moment of truth, will she be brave enough to do it?)
Well Florina, it looks like you'll be joining the rest of us in shedding our clothes. I almost thought for a minute that you might not have to...
It looks like you are back to normal? How curious, even with all my time spent exploring the Outrealms I still run into all sorts of enigma such as yourself.
A warp spell? Who is this?
I see that even though you've lost, you're in quite good spirits. Claude told me that you're quite the go-getter, and it seems he was telling the truth.
You may have lost, but I can clearly tell your confidence has not been shaken. That's an admirable trait.
So you've lost again? What do you plan on removing next, Leonie?
Another loss for you? Well, you've still got plenty of options to choose from.
I can tell that necklace is very sentimental to you. I feel much the same way about my tiara.
Your bra instead of your necklace? A bold choice, but if it has sentimental value for you, I understand.
(I've traveled across many worlds and met many dangerous people... But Chara somehow seems greater than any foe I've encountered!)
(She's clearly the cold calculating type. The kind that would get others to do her work for her. If she were a commander...)
(The kind of evil I imagine from Chara... It doesn't matter how many times you strike it down. It will follow you everywhere, in some form.)
You're a pirate, correct? I don't mean to be rude, but you really do not look the part.

state.text: Have you read any new exciting books, Estelle? I recall you carrying quite an impressive collection when we last met.

case.state: Oh! I just remembered! Do you have the enchanting belle outfit with you? We never did get around to trading.
Estelle, what was your life like back at the castle? I'm starting to realize that while we may both be princesses, we have lived very different lives.
You've been traveling for some time now, right, Fina? Do you enjoy the adventurer's life? Or would you rather return to the peaceful days back home?
Princess Minerva? Interesting... a friend of mine rides a wyvern with that name.
~target~, there are a lot of weapons in this place. If either of us has to remove our blade, we should take care nobody mistakes it as being part of the collection.
I agree, it's definitely ~name~'s turn to strip.
Keep it up Florina, I know you can do it!
If this was a more traditional battle, I'm fairly confident that I would have good odds of coming out on top. If anyone would like to spar with me, I'm up for the challenge.
I don't know what everyone else's desired position is, but I prefer to be right in the thick of it, surrounded by enemies! It's there that I can make the most impact!
W-what? Sweat? I don't even think the shadiest members of the Anna family would purchase sweat.
While I don't dislike them, hairy chests remind me of some of the brutes we fight. A man without hair comes across as much more gentle... You were talking about chests, right?
I came here alone on purpose, but I could easily get almost anyone from our camp to come here with me... If I wanted to.
Well, it seems I'm off to a good start here.
I know it's only the first round, but this game's result is already looking promising for me.
If I understand the rules right, this means you need to take a piece of clothing off. Please feel free to start slowly.
I'm sorry ~name~, but from what I was told about how things work here, you'll need to remove an article.
Keep this up and you might find yourself right alongside me...
The thought of ~name~ stripping didn't excite me until now...
Just remember what's at stake, ~name~. Think you can handle it?
You're not going to retreat now, are you, ~name~?
If this is what they consider "bad", than what you must do is simple by comparison.
I'm feeling a little thirsty, ~name~. Think you can get me something to drink?
I'm not normally that interested... but then again, is anything normal about this?
I think we might make for a good team, ~name~... Want to keep losing to find out?
I was a bit worried about making ~name~ lose at first... But now that I've lost, I still want her to lose... It's strange.
Part of me thinks you wanted to lose, even if only a little, ~name~.
You're still in the game. That alone is an achievement, ~name~.
I know this seems most unfortunate, but you should be thankful you still have something to remove.
Did you lose on purpose, ~name~? I wouldn't blame you if you did...
If you're going to lose, make it something they won't forget!
If you fall, ~name~, I'll be there to catch you. Keep going!
The only skill that's important in this game, is how well you handle your loses, ~name~.
Not bad, ~name~. But you need to do better to compete with me.
If I can keep this up, I'll win this game for sure.
I pray my enigmatic nature isn't a cause of stress for you, ~name~. Beneath this mask, you might find we have a fair bit in common.
(~Name~ is eyeing me. Can she can see through my disguise?)
Rather unlucky isn't it? I assure you, I did not win this hand through skill.
It would seem you lost this round, ~name~.
Please consider your options carefully, ~name~.
I'm really sorry, ~name~, but if I'm going to win that means you need to lose.
Father... I won!
My victory over ~name~ feels a little hollow. I didn't really do anything.
Normally I give feedback to my bested rivals, but I'm just as lost as you are here, ~name~.
For me to stay in this game, that means someone else must fall... It brings back unpleasant memories.
It would seem you lost this round, ~name~. You know what you must do now, right?
Please consider your options carefully ~name~. Well... not too carefully, I do plan on winning after all.
I've endured several losses leading up to this point, and they have only served to bring us closer. You can do this, ~name~.
Yes!
That was incredibly suspenseful... And I loved it!
My apologies, ~name~. This game can be rather embarrassing at times, can't it?
There we are! Another round secured. At this rate I might be able to turn this game around!
A tie? Perhaps some sort of duel could determine the winner? No...That'd be a bit excessive.
Aha! Finally, I can see his face! I'll never forget this!
That thing certainly is an... interesting contraption. You say it can summon monsters? I've never seen anything like it before!
Watch it! You could have killed someone with that!
(What would be the best case scenario for ~name~ being here? And what would be the worst?)

state.text: (Maybe it's for the best I found myself at this table. Someone has to keep the order here.)

case.state: Stay on your best behavior. It will be better for both of us.
The Inventory let both of us in here, so I'll do my best to respect that and not start anything with you.

state.text: I suppose no matter where I go, there will always be troublemakers.

case.state: (Something about looking at ~name~ makes my heart sink a little...)

state.text: (That's the face of someone with a lot of weight in the back of his head. Did he come here to escape from those problems?)
(Someone like ~name~ cannot of lead a simple life... What's his past like?)

case.state: (His tail implies that he might need a stone to maintain this form... I hope they let him keep it.)
Forgive me for staring, ~name~. I'm just fascinated by your outfit. I can hardly imagine the world you come from.
Your world is so distant, ~name~. Yet, by simply showing up here you've managed to share it with us all.
You'd think after meeting so many soldiers I'd have seen everything by now. But that could not be further from the truth.
It feels good to finally play some cards with another soldier. I'm not usually invited.
Whatever surprise tactic you're employing , ~name~... it's working. I completely forgot about your ~clothing~.
Um... did you forget you had this or...
Y-you still had this little thing and yet you... I don't understand.
Sigh... Not giving me much to work with, are you.
So what will you be removing? How about your... oh. Well, that works too, I guess...
I...um. I mean, it's not against the rules...
Oh... right. We're playing a game where winning is important...
I mean... At least there are other things to look at here, I suppose. Right...?
It's like to confess to someone, only to have them reject you...You um... Don't see that often...
We're well past the early game at this point, ~name~.
I managed to lose it all and yet you still have accessories? It's clear that I was outmatched from the beginning.
Let's find a new way to compete after the game alright, ~name~? I want to find a place where I can beat you!
It takes a certain amount of bravery to be boring at a time like this. I'll give you that.
That's a fine choice, ~name~. That said, it doesn't put you in any position to make requests.
There is nothing wrong with removing your ~clothing~, good choice.
Ah, so you've chosen to remove your ~clothing~? Can't say I blame you, ~name~.
Good choice, there is no need to rush things.
Just removing something small like your ~clothing~ seems like a good strategy.
Considering the fact that I'm wearing a mask, I cannot fault you for keeping a low profile.
(How would he go about playing this game?)
Prioritizing your own survival instead of showing off... I respect it, ~name~.
Right... Seems simple enough.
There's no need to go fast, ~name~. This is your leisure time, correct?
Planning ahead are we, ~name~? I wish you the best!
(~Name~ seems fairly carefree. I wish I could afford to be like that from time to time.)
... Hm? Oh, forgive me, ~name~. I was thinking about... Well, nothing you need to worry yourself about.
To be entirely honest, I'm a bit disappointed.
That's surprisingly cautious of you, ~name~. I haven't rattled you in some way, have I?
I might have gotten a little eager. I forgot ~name~ had his ~clothing~.
Still standing strong, ~name~? It's impressive but...
Are you really trying to taunt me, or are you simply trying to motivating me, ~name~? Take caution either way!
I wouldn't want you to be going easy on me now, ~name~, even if I do think you could handle your losses with a bit more flourish.
I can't believe how closely I'm watching you remove your ~clothing~, ~name~! It's ridiculous!
Florina, I'm pretty sure he's been able to see you this entire time...
So that's what you look like... Not so impressive now, are you?
Being patient with the wicked is my Father's specialty. Not mine. Keep that in mind, ~name~.
I'm here to relax, ~name~. If that's all you're here for as well, then we won't have any trouble.
I suppose I can let out a sigh of relief for now.
You're fine now... But how am I to know you won't cause a ruckus when things get more serious?
(Could he truly be here just to play an honest game of poker?)
Whatever it may be worth you, ~name~. I just want to say I'm glad your here.

state.text: Perhaps we should talk some more after this, ~name~. We might have more in common than I initially thought.

case.state: It isn't always easy coming to social gatherings like this, is it, ~name~? Sometimes I just like to have time to myself.

state.text: Seeing someone from so far off in the future does give me a bit of hope, even if they are from another world. Thank you, ~name~.

case.state: I half expect your ~clothing~ to transform or something. Maybe that's a bit much, even for your future.

state.text: I have a lot of questions I could ask you after this game. If you don't mind of course.

case.state: I'm glad we've both lived long enough to meet here like this, ~name~.

state.text: Perhaps one day, none of us will have to fight anymore. I hope to see you then, ~name~.

case.state: He only removed his ~clothing~ and yet you started panicking? Are you aware of what game you are playing?
There's no need to get so worked up over something small like that Florina.
Florina, do you get nervous around men? It's funny, I know a man with a similar issue... (What would happen if they met?)
If you don't mind me asking, what exactly are those things you removed from your head?
If the others complain, feel free to ignore them.
Now that that's over, let's continue playing.
Well, that's one less barrier between me and victory... let's begin the next round!
You're safe for now, but how many small items do you have remaining?
(Perhaps I shouldn't stay too long. There are people like ~name~ who need protecting.)
Let's get to know each other more over the course of the game. Okay, ~name~?
You can't hide behind little things like that forever.
I don't suppose you could be a bit more ambitious next time?
Come now. Surely you can be a bit more adventurous.
Don't think for a second that I'm letting that be the last thing you remove.
Is there any way I can convince you to forfeit the rest of your clothing, ~name~? I need to brush up my diplomacy.
If you wish to earn my respect, you'll have to display a bit more courage, ~name~.
Would you care to train with me, ~name~? I'll only accept your challenge if you strip to my level, of course.
I'm not sure why, but I had expected better of you than this.
(I guess I'm not very appealing to ~name~...)
If I'm going to do this in front of you, I'd rather not be reduced to using my imagination, ~name~.
I thought there was something special about this moment, but I suppose that was a selfish expectation.
I don't take kindly to taunts, ~name~.
I guess I'll just stick to my fantasies...
If I wasn't already out of the game I'd probably be a bit upset about this.
You didn't just come here to leer at naked women while protecting yourself with cheap tricks, did you?
You're running on borrowed time, ~name~. Best end the game quick if you want to avoid slipping.
(Patience, Lucina. It's gotten you this far...)
(I've slain hordes of Risen, yet I couldn't even get ~name~ out of his ~clothing~?)
I won't berate you for your choice ~name~... But that doesn't mean I'll stop the others from doing it.
Now that that's over, let us continue playing.
A good man never reveals his character too early... right, ~name~?
Come to think of it, why is it allowed for some players of this game to have more articles than others? Surely that isn't very fair...
Oh... so you think that guns beat swords, do you? I'll have you know I've taken on opponents wielding firearms, and honestly I don't see it.
You want to put your theory to practice, Revy? All I would need to do is close the distance, and you'd be bested.

condition.saying: I-is it okay to start with my sword, Prince Marth?

case.state: I... uh... your sword is a perfectly fine choice. (Why does this girl care so much about my opinion?)
Remove whatever you like. There are no rules to determine order, just common sense.
Akko! I... what have you... Stand back everyone, I'll see if I can stop her!
Wait— Florina?! Where are you going? It's just a game!
Gods, I didn't think someone could run that fast in armor!
Umm... should I go see if she requires help?
Ah! You had me fooled there for a second, Zoey.
Ah! So bright! Wait... where did you come from? What is this trickery?
Wearing a jacket like a skirt? I'd have never have thought of that myself... but now I kind of want to try it myself sometime.
You know, now that I think of it, that's a very creative way to wear a jacket. I wonder if mother would be OK with my lobster-print coat if I was to wear it that way...
I suppose that as an archer, those gloves must get a lot of use. I've tried my hand at archery myself, and it was quickly apparent that gloves were a good idea.
You're primarily an archer, right? I've heard that your Leicester Alliance heavily relies on bows for its military.
Don't worry Catria, though you are now bereft of your sword, I swear by the sacred blade Falchion I will do my utmost to protect you from harm.
Have no fear, though you may be currently unarmed, you can rely on me to protect you.
You seem nervous. I understand your feelings, I wouldn't feel comfortable without my sword either.
It's just a little length of leather, I'm sure you'll be able to manage this.
Ah, I knew something seemed... off about you. This is your true form, is it not?
What are you... ah, I see you had a secret weapon in reserve. Clever.
I'm unsure why removing a bow is such a big deal, but if you require my secrecy, you have it.
I'm sure you'll still look divine even without them.
That's a really beautiful pendant, Lady Palutena. It's going to be a bit strange seeing you without it.
Without your decorative belts, you might actually look a lot more like a mortal.
That's... rather unique and useful relic, Nami. Very rarely do such tools have use out of combat.
You should very well know that you can't go around wasting charges of your staff like that.
Speaking of accessories, I happen to have this super cute bear hat. Maybe I'll get a chance to show it to you someday.
Ah yes. Back when I was still in Askr, my summoner gave me all sorts of wonderful accessories as a parting gift.
Well, now that you know that you can have a better strategy nex... wait, what are the odds of you ever even returning to this place?
A-again? Just what sort of pranks does this Palla play on you?
(What would be the best case scenario for ~name~ being here? And what would be the worst?)

state.text: (Maybe it's for the best I found myself at this table. Someone has to keep the order here.)

case.state: Stay on your best behavior. It will be better for both of us.
The Inventory let both of us in here, so I'll do my best to respect that and not start anything with you.

state.text: I suppose no matter where I go, there will always be troublemakers.
(Something about looking at ~name~ makes my heart sink a little...)
(Such a grim aura... Is this how the others view me?)
(That's the face of someone with a lot of weight in the back of her head. Did she come here to escape from those problems?)

case.state: (Her tail implies that she might need a stone to maintain this form... I hope they let her keep it.)
Forgive me for staring, ~name~. I'm just fascinated by your outfit. I can hardly imagine the world you come from.
Your world is so distant, ~name~. Yet, by simply showing up here you've managed to share it with us all.
Whatever surprise tactic you're employing , ~name~... it's working. I completely forgot about your ~clothing~.
Um... did you forget you had this or...
Y-you still had this little thing and yet you... I don't understand.
If there is anything I can do you make this situation more comfortable, ~name~, simply ask.
I'm... actually not very used to observing the women undress.
I get the feeling this game is going to be a learning experience for both of us, ~name~.
We are only just getting acquainted, ~name~. Still, I'm enjoying this a great deal.
Keeping to yourself is something I can understand, ~name~. It can be difficult to find trustworthy people.
As the game progresses you're going to lose more articles than just your ~clothing~. Savor it while you still have it, ~name~.
You have the advantage, ~name~. Best stay calm if you wish to keep it.
I respect you as a rival, ~name~. That's exactly why I cannot afford to let up on you.
(Maybe if I brought this game home with me, I could best some of my allies. It would be so exciting if...)
(~Name~ has a strong defense. I wonder if I can use that against her?)
There's no time to discuss your ~clothing~. We've already entered the heart of the game!
The ~clothing~ is already coming off! That just leaves...
Delay all you want, you'll be in my situation eventually, just you wait.
I'm literally naked and yet you're still removing that little? Has Naga forsaken me?
I'm starting to get the feeling that I'm not going to be winning this game...

So what will you be removing? How about your... oh. Well, that works too, I guess...
Ready to expose a little skin? W-wait, what are you doing?
That's a cold tactic, ~name~.
I'm starting to see a bit of myself in, ~name~... and not in a good way.
Didn't you come here to have fun?
I used this exact same stalling strategy, and yet...
Alright, alright. You've made your point, ~name~.
I'm so focused on seeing people naked, I forgot you even had that as an option!
Do as you please! I'm confident the others will bring you down, ~name~!
Did you get to pick your outfit out today? (Some variety in what I wear would be nice...)
On you, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look|looks)~... adorable? I believe that's the word my aunt uses to describe such things.
That will do for now, ~name~.
Like sparring with sticks, I can go all out and not have to worry about wounding my rival!
(Getting to play a game with another girl... It's just like when I was a child...)
This is a nice change of pace. Other women don't usually approach me, even for small talk.
(I wonder if this will be the last time I do something like this with ~name~. I should make it count.)
Well played, ~name~.
Off with it.
I can unfortunately confirm that Florina is telling the truth about the floor being cold...
If you don't mind, I'd be happy to join you all in sparring as well. A warrior must keep their skills well-honed.
I... I think you might be underselling that bug just a little bit Florina...There are not many things I fear, but...
Hmmm... Florina, now that you mention it, I guess Samus's zero suit is a bit... form-fitting.
I have the same question as Florina, would you consider elaborating?
Florina, I'm pretty sure it's called a "zero" suit because its her last layer of clothing. She normally wears bulky orange armor over the top of it.
You badly underestimate Lady Lyndis... when she really wants to fight serious, I've seen her move so fast she leaves afterimages in her wake.
Awkward? What do you mean, Florina?
That's horrible! Let her go this instant, Perona!
That wasn't too bad now, was it?
See? I knew you could do it

condition.saying: my spear instead

case.state: Speaking of spears, while I prefer the sword I do have some experience wielding spears as well.
While Falchion will always be my blade of choice, I do have a personal spear of my own named Geirskögul.
Speaking of spears, the other day I was training with my lance Geirskögul... and accidentally destroyed the training dummy. Sigh
If I may ask, maybe after this game you could teach me how to better use a lance? I've got room to improve.

condition.saying: my sword and my belts in two rounds

case.state: Given that you've removed your belt and sheath simultaneously, if I lose I guess it's only fair that I do so as well...
It takes a commendable spirit to return after running from something. Welcome back, Florina.
You're pretty shy, aren't you Florina? You remind me of a dancer I know back home.
Oh? You plan on becoming a doctor? That's wonderful, my Aunt happens to be a healer-cleric herself. She's a bit... spirited, but her heart is in the right place.

condition.saying: collarbone

case.state: It's a very nice collarbone, if I may say so myself. Divine, even,

condition.saying: genuine gold

case.state: That pendant was solid gold? Is it strenuous having such a heavy piece of jewelry around your neck all the time?
Magic? Given how many magical artifacts you have in your possession, I suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
I've never been one for collecting bounties. So long as you're not causing trouble, you'll have no reason to fear me, Nami.
You don't seem like a bad person to me, Nami. If you were, we would have had a word with or without the poster.
Thank you Leonie, I'll do my best to keep that in mind. My fine control isn't quite there yet...
I was practicing speed nocking the other day, and I became so focused that...well... My fine control isn't quite there yet.
Such confidence even without your primary weapon... I'm sure you know how to handle yourself in a fight.
Woah! You're a cat Laguz? It's been a while since I've seen a Laguz such as yourself, they aren't native to my world.
Oh? You're actually a Taguel? Wait... no, you're something else, aren't you. My mistake.
"Not enough"? I don't quite understand, but if you want to take off more and make it easier for me to win... I won't object.
... Well, that was regrettable. It seems that without the belt, her skirt will have to be removed as well.
But a dent in her outfit. I get the feeling it's going to take a lot of work to get Lady Palutena down to her essentials.
Even without all the embellishment, she still looks her part. I suppose she'll always have that glow to her.
Wearing a jacket as a belt may not be common, but I think that just makes you... (What did Forrest call it?) ...avant-garde?

state.text: We don't need to light of Rausten to believe you, Princess. Based on your demeanor, it's quite clear who you are.

case.state: This Princess Minerva you speak of... did she perchance ride a wyvern into combat?
Being patient with the wicked is my Father's specialty. Not mine. Keep that in mind, ~name~.
I'm here to relax, ~name~. If that's all you're here for as well, then we won't have any trouble.
I suppose I can let out a sigh of relief for now.
You're fine now... But how am I to know you won't cause a ruckus when things get more serious?
(Could she truly be here just to play an honest game of poker?)
Whatever it may be worth to you, ~name~. I just want to say I'm glad your here.

state.text: Perhaps we should talk some more after this, ~name~. We might have more in common than I initially thought.

case.state: It isn't always easy coming to social gatherings like this, is it, ~name~? Sometimes I just like to have time to myself.

state.text: Seeing someone from so far off in the future does give me a bit of hope, even if they are from another world. Thank you, ~name~.

case.state: I half expect your ~clothing~ to transform or something. Maybe that's a bit much, even for your future.

state.text: I have a lot of questions I could ask you after this game. If you don't mind of course.

case.state: Hmm... "war of attrition"? I wouldn't say it's that extreme.
Shouldn't you have rather have removed this before showing us your privates?
This... isn't exactly the order I would have chosen to remove my clothes in, but...
To be perfectly honest, your choices for the order of what you strip leaves me... confused.
If you don't mind me asking, what exactly are those things you removed from your head?
Pardon the question, but what exactly is that strange headband you've been wearing?
Belts have such a fine utility to them. I am quite fond of them myself.
For a traveling warrior such as myself, belts really are useful for securing my belongings.
Belts may not cover any skin, but their importance shouldn't be underestimated.
Will you still be able to see alright without your spectacles, ~target~?
You know, in my world, wearable viewing lenses are pretty uncommon. They exist, but are usually reserved for mages.
So, how exactly is your vision without those things? Do you think you'll still be able to make out your cards, ~target~?
Not only are gloves quite practical, they offer untold options for individualizing one's outfit.
This reminds me... Just the other day, I found an adorable pair of gloves covered with printed images of skunks. I have no idea why they were in the bargain bin!
~Target~, it's a shame you have to remove your headwear, you look much more modest without it.
You know, ~target~, I have a cute hat of my own. It's this adorable bear hat with these cute little eyes, big round ears, and..
Oh? A necklace? Does it have sentimental value to you? My mother used to wear one sometimes, and I keep it in... remembrance of her.
Jewelry? Not a bad pick, I'd do the same if I was wearing any myself.
So, you're going with your bracelet next? Can't say I blame you for picking it, even if it's the least flashy play you could imagine..
Hmmm... if bracelets count, perhaps I could have counted my hairband? Well, too late now.
I wish to see more from you. Until then, let's continue.
This is such a strange way of getting to know someone, there really is much in this world I have yet to experience.
Small trinkets are such curious things. To some they bear no meaning, yet others would risk their lives to protect what little they have.
Should I lose any of the upcoming rounds, I hope to handle my defeat with as much grace as you just displayed.
Maybe I should just be focusing on my own state. Let's carry on.
Every bit of damage to the enemy is important. I won't be deterred!
No... I can't afford to get overconfident. It's only ever gotten me in trouble.
I need to get the rest of your clothes off, now!
I've already run out of these little trinkets. Naga willing, you will too.
I remember when I was in your position. I wonder if you will learn from my mistakes.
Playing passive isn't guaranteed to bring victory. Are you certain that's how you wish to approach this, ~name~?
I'm having a lot of fun here, ~name~. Let's continue!
That was only a mere taste of what's to come!
For Naga's sake, ~name~, what more must I do to win your respect?
... That's just insulting at this point.
I wanted to win too, ~name~... But was before I realized just how good losing could be.
There was a sense of comradery there for a moment, but now it's gone...
You've stalled successfully, ~name~... But at what cost?
Perhaps my interest was merely an impulse. Apologies, ~name~.
Would you mind if I ask you for a few poker tips? It's clear that your skill exceeds mine by far.
If you're going to take something small off, at least make it a little fun.
Come on, live a little! Who knows when you'll get to play again!
This really drives home just how hard I got crushed...
Lighten up a bit, ~name~. I know I'm one to talk, but being reserved is tiring, is it not?
You want to make it out with a clean victory, ~name~? So be it. But we will do everything in our power to stop you!
Oh! Do you have any other trinkets like your ~clothing~? I'd love to see the rest of your wardrobe!
It really is as simple as removing her ~clothing~, isn't it?
Are you ready to try again?
Small as it may seem, I'll be committing this moment to memory. Thank you, ~name~.
You're good company, ~name~. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
Dusted yourself off? Good! Let's keep going!
I'm ready when you are, ~name~.
I'm glad to have learned of this game!
... Go on.
Gods, I never thought I'd be playing games with someone that would normally be my enemy...

state.text: (Any enemies I make while traveling could endanger my friends. I should be careful to only fight if I have to.)

case.state: I'm... sorry. I don't think I can make small talk with you and have it be sincere.
(If I was even possible to win over and reform ~name~, it would probably be the strangest recruitment story of all time.)
I don't think healers like you get enough appreciation. I should really express my gratitude to them more often.
I've... tried learning healing magic before. It requires a certain amount of faith that I don't think I'm capable of.
We can always use someone with your medical talents... But it wouldn't be right. You have already have people who rely on you.
(Someone returning from the dead and maintaining their free will. I can't believe I've never thought of it before.)
(Well... Florina's temperament around guys seems to be improving, at least a little bit.)
(Florina is definitely adjusting to this game. )
(This may still be awkward, but at least she's handling this situation better now.)
Wait, if you still had that, why did you...
Um... did you forget you had this or...
Y-you still had this little thing and yet you... I don't understand.
Well, removing your ~clothing~ is a sensible choice given your options, ~name~.
Nothing is truly expendable. Everything has a cost.
Do you have a larger plan at play, ~name~? Or are you simply improvising?
Losing is inevitable. What's important is knowing when it's okay to lose.
Your front line is falling, ~name~.
You're doing well, ~name~. Don't let this halt your momentum.
Come on, ~name~! There's no reason to hold back!
Having minor things to remove like your ~clothing~ now seems like a distant memory.
We have a long way to go together, ~name~! I wouldn't linger too long if I were you!
Well, I can't blame you for trying to keep your clothes on...
You're fine, ~name~... It's just frustrating that it took me losing my essentials before I got serious.
Lay siege on his ~clothing~! Leave not a single ounce of cloth upon his body!
I'm glad it's you, ~name~. We wouldn't want things to get stale around here...
Gods... There really is a steep mountain of clothing between the two of us...
This is just a practice round, right? Surely you can do better!
(Gods, what's gotten into me? I just want to see more and more!)
I'll let you off easy, ~name~. But only because I've just hit the perfect spot...
It seems I'll be left wanting for just a little longer...
(I bet he would take something bigger off...)
If you want to replace the man in my fantasy, ~name~, you'll have to be a bit more bold.
Find the small victories where you can, ~name~.
Wait, just your... oh, sorry, I'm being too judgmental, aren't I?
If I was better at this game... (sigh) Sorry, just thinking out loud.
You're not just going to let him get away with that, are you?
Oh, right. His ~clothing~... (I was focusing a little too hard on his chest...)
(If he were in our army, he'd best serve as a... no. I need to not be thinking about these things right now.)
~clothing.ifPlural(Ah, your ~clothing~ seem expendable enough.|Ah, your ~clothing~ seems expendable enough.)~
I've never been invited to play cards with the soldiers. I think I'd decline anyway, I'm just worried they're intimidated by me...
What a strange little hobby this is.
Simple and effective.
I'd have seen this as a waste of time not too long ago... Still, I don't want to get too comfortable.
Let me know if I am prodding too much at you, ~name~. I can always leave you be.
Inigo has been playing this game in secret, and apparently has been going out of his way to make sure I don't find out...
Your glasses must of fallen off when you were stripping. You can't see without those, right?
I'm afraid that I'm not in a hugging mood right now. Sorry.
My apologies, but I will not be hugging strangers I've only met minutes before.
Sorry, I don't do hugs very often, even on the best of days.
... How did you manage to have a fan in your inventory without you being aware of it?

state.text: (What would it be like to travel alongside ~name~? What things would we have seen together? Maybe in another life, it would've been possible.)

case.state: It's just ~clothing.a~~clothing~... And yet I still can't help but think he's hiding something.
If it's anything like visiting the Smash realms, then I suppose not everyone here needs to get along...
(At the very least, not everyone I've met here is like ~name~... I should prioritize keeping them safe.)
Just be thankful it's me here and not my sister, ~name~. She'd give you a twenty minute speech about "reformation and repentance"!

state.text: I wonder if this is what Emmeryn would want if she was still with us. Moving past our differences without fighting.

case.state: Thank you for your work, ~name~. Saving even one life is a great feat.
You don't possess the power to heal clothing do you...? Sorry, I'm still not very good at making jokes.
Let me know if you want me to get you anything, ~name~. You definitely deserve this break.

state.text: (If that's the case, then the Risen under Grima's control have lost their identities! For them, and for everyone, I will strike him down!!)

case.state: (It would be so ideal if we could even bring some of them back, similar to ~name~. Alas, that's not how it works back home.)
(~Name~ isn't a Risen though. I have to cast aside my previous experiences and accept him at face value.)
How must he see me if he feels the need to hide such things from me? Do the others share a similar sentiment?

condition.saying: men

case.state: If I didn't know better, I'd say it sounds like you have a crush on this mystery man.
If you wouldn't mind me asking, who is this man you speak of?
Yet, you must remove your ~clothing~ all the same.
Was that a bit much? Apologies, I was just thinking how my cousin would react.
With your ~clothing~ out of the way, let us continue onwards to the next round.
(I wouldn't mind crossing blades with ~name~, but didn't Father say something about not getting too close to men I just met?)
~Clothing~ well removed.
As you lose more, your guard is only going to get higher, yes?
I think I'm starting to get a grasp of the basics. Keep up the challenge, ~name~!
You'll see this through to the end, right ~name~? I'd hate to see you stop there.
I'm pretty new to... well, most of this. Thank you for keeping the pace steady, ~name~.
Apologies if you were looking forward to playing with another man here tonight, ~name~. It was not my intent to deceive.
Er... Sorry, ~name~. I hope I'm not boring you...
I'm not giving up on winning, ~name~. You can count on that!
Sorry, but if I'm going to win, you're going to have to remove a whole lot more than just that.
I'll close the gap between us, it won't be long now...
Okay... I'll just have to try twice as hard to defeat ~name~!
What am I to do with you, ~name~?
Take your time, I'm playing the long game here.
I don't think this is what I initially wanted... It's somehow better though!
I think everyone here wants to see more of you, ~name~. It's my job to ensure that happens!
I'm attracted to those who can take decisive action. Keep that in mind for next time, okay, ~name~?
I won't be like this in front of you again, ~name~. Just know that when you make such choices.
I can hold out on my imagination for just a little longer... Just promise me it will pay off.
Come, ~name~. There's nothing to be afraid of.
It's not much... But I've always been able to work with very little.
Hrnnn! So much for chivalry.
Eventually, you're going to be backed into a corner. When that happens, I'll be there to support you.
You're not just going to let him get away with that, are you?
I may have done the same... But I'm starting to see things from a very different context now...
I guess this just means I have a lot to learn!
I'm a little worried though. Are you really enjoying yourself, ~name~?
With that out of the way, let us continue onwards to the next round.
I'm still not fully sure what all of this will amount to. I suppose I'll have to win more to find out.
There really is no use dwelling on your loss. You'll only open yourself up to future defeats.
I suppose removing your ~clothing~ is simply a formality. No use overthinking it.
Perhaps I should drop the battlefield analogies. The stakes here are remarkably low.
Keep your composure. Just because I'm wearing a mask, it doesn't mean I'm intangible.
How about some one on one lightning rounds between me and ~name~? We keep going until one of us is eliminated!
Lyn, what do you think you're doing?! There's no need to be this aggressive.
Hey! Careful Lyn, you might hurt her!
Lyn, there's no need to use force here. I'm sure Florina will do the right thing by herself...
When it comes to dancing, I'm afraid I have little to no talent. I'd love for someone to teach me though...
Don't listen to her Florina, you are doing great.
Lyn, I agree with Florina. He doesn't need to know about this little... incident.
Lady Florina, I apologize if my presence here is bothering you.
I'm not going near that thing, it's HUGE! ... No! Florina needs help!
Florina, as formidable a foe as it may be, I won't allow it to set a single hairy leg on you! Just stay still a second and...
Florina, on my honor, they will hear absolutely nothing of this from me. I swear it.
Where did Shantae go, and... why is there suddenly an adorable purple creature where she was dancing? It's so cute!
You know, this really isn't helping me from thinking of you as a Risen...
Removing your socks and shoes simultaneously? Are you that confident in victory, Leonie?
Leonie, given this game's goal, I don't know why you would want to remove two items at once... But if that's what you want to do, I won't try to stop you.
Huh. I can't say that I've considered it before, but I've marched up and down the continent quite a lot over the years. The distance I've traveled must be tremendous.
It's a shame you have to remove those gloves Catria, they look really good on you.
Huh, in my homeland, Pegasus knights wear steel vambraces instead of fabric gloves. It's not much, but every extra bit of protection counts.
The uniform of my nation's pegasus knight is pretty similar, but Ylissian knights have garters attached to their leggings.
Catria, if we get the chance I'd love to introduce you to my sister and mother. They are both pegasus knights just like you!
(Wow, that tunic is a bit short... even for a pegasus knight uniform.)
If you need assistance with that armor, I'd be happy to aid you. I help my sister with her armor all the time.
Catria, I'm sorry, but as a man I don't think it's appropriate for me to help you... oh, yes, never mind then.
I imagine those gloves have done an admirable job of keeping you warm while flying through the cold skies, yes?
Now this is what I expect out of a pegasus knight. Err... not the stripping, but you know what I meant, right?
It's safe to take your armor off, Florina. I'll see to that.
Don't worry Florina, I don't think any of us will be needing armor protection right now. This place is hardly a battlefield.
I can't say I've heard of Matakihara City before, but I wouldn't mind you explaining what makes it so special to you. What's it like, Sayaka?
Would people still want you to step on them if they saw your bare feet, Lady Palutena? Maybe showing them would scare them off.
If it isn't a bother to you, do you suppose you could give me clothing tips some time? I've been told my fashion sense could use some work...
... Go on.
Gods, I never thought I'd be playing games with someone that would normally be my enemy...

state.text: (Any enemies I make while traveling could endanger my friends. I should be careful to only fight if I have to.)

case.state: I'm... sorry. I don't think I can make small talk with you and have it be sincere.
(If I was even possible to win over and reform ~name~, it would probably be the strangest recruitment story of all time.)
I don't think healers like you get enough appreciation. I should really express my gratitude to them more often.
I've... tried learning healing magic before. It requires a certain amount of faith that I don't think I'm capable of.
We can always use someone with your medical talents... But it wouldn't be right; you have already have people who rely on you.
(Someone returning from the dead and maintaining their free will. I can't believe I've never thought of it before.)
Wait, if you still had that, why did you...
Um... did you forget you had this or...
Y-you still had this little thing and yet you... I don't understand.
Hey, I don't want to be rude, but shouldn't you have considered removing this prior to... you know...
... Excuse me, aren't you supposed to forfeit this in advance of exposing your genitals?
Well, removing your ~clothing~ is a sensible choice given your options, ~name~.
My friend tried to convince me that if I want to be historically accurate as Marth, I need to flirt with every woman I see.
(If I wanted to be perceived as a normal woman from this time, would I conduct myself in a manner similar to ~name~?)
I hope you don't mind a bit of friendly competition, ~name~.
Oh! On my way here I saw a merchant selling ~clothing.toPlural~ just like yours, but with the cutest pattern!
I'm seeing all kinds of clothing today I'm simply not used to seeing. Very few of the soldiers ever wear civilian clothes.
Did any of your friends pick your ~clothing~ for you, ~name~? It compliments you quite well!
(Does ~name~ have any hobbies? How would I ask her about that without prying?)
... For a moment I thought you were going for something big, pardon me.
You're fine going at your current pace, ~name~!
(I could have gotten that off of her so much earlier... )
This isn't exactly what I'd call sporting. But then again, neither is complaining about your opponent.
(Her clothing advantage is actually somewhat imposing. In any other circumstance that would be ridiculous!)
Wait... you're seriously going to keep going like this? I thought I was wearing you down!
You've been holding out for a while now haven't you?
Sorry, ~name~. For a moment I got caught up in the moment and started thinking rather selfishly.
So what do you think about doing me a favor and removing your... oh, I suppose it's not my place to ask.
H-how did you still have something like that? Am... am I just that bad at poker?
(I suppose if I want to get closer to ~name~, I'm going to have to just do better next time...)
I guess your ~clothing~ isn't too important. Just don't be flustered if we ask for more.
Well, it's better than nothing.
The other's may seem agitated, ~name~, but they're just upset because you're keeping yourself from us.
I suppose I should have expected this from you.
Your ~clothing~ has served you well. Why not take a moment to part with it?
If you're playing this, you must know how to treat yourself, ~name~.
Sometimes giving up one small thing can be all it takes to become capable of carrying a burden.
As far the game goes, there's no way to undo this. Be certain with your choices, ~name~.
Caution is never out of place, even here.
There's a layer of strategy to everything, no matter how small.
I can tell you two really are close. Friendship is a lovely thing, is it not?
Ah! Florina, are you alright?

condition.saying: This sand is really hot.

case.state: That would be why they call it a "Hotrealm". Though I have heard some people around the camp calling it that for different reasons.
Removing two items at once is certainly a bold decision... Now let us see if it comes back to bite you!
F-florina, I don't think you needed to say that...
You've already done much better than me. Stay strong, Florina!

condition.saying: Woohoo! I actually did it!

case.state: I knew you could do it Florina. It's good to have confidence in yourself.
I knew... But it is a little nerve wracking thinking about actually doing it. Though it is also a bit exciting...

condition.saying: Why is everyone watching? It's a little s-scary.

case.state: O-oh, sorry, is me watching you remove those making you nervous? I can look away if you want.

condition.saying: Okay... bare legs in front of everyone. My heart is racing.

case.state: You're still perfectly modest Florina, you don't need to panic.
F-florina! Ah? Are you alright? It seems it was content merely to shred your tunic... hmmm... this is all most unusual.

condition.saying: Er, is something wrong, Lucina? Why are you looking at me like that?

case.state: W-w-what? Something wrong? No... I was just, uh, thinking about... something. Nothing to worry yourself about.

condition.saying: This reminds me of the time I fell off my pegasus into a puddle of mud, and Lyn walked in on me changing...

case.state: Oh? She's a friend though, right? I'd think that'd be less embarrassing than, say, a stranger.
That's a very... unique application of makeup. Is such an application considered fashionable in your world?
Wait, what? N-no Catria, you don't need to remove anything else. (What an odd question.)
Why are you asking me a question like that Catria? I was under the impression that the goal of this game was to remain clothed...
That's... err... nice to know? I guess? (Wait, was Caeda the name of the Hero Kings consort?)
Hmmm... while your armor is of a different style than the ones pegasus knights wear in my homeland, I see that it still follows similar basic design principles.
You're doing a good job of keeping your cool despite how you must be feeling, I'm impressed.
Even without your tunic, you're still decently clothed. It's really no different than wearing a sundress, right?
(If I didn't know better, I'd say Catria was insecure about her beasts.)
Catria, you've got nothing to be ashamed of. You're quite the beautiful women.
I wish I still had my cape to give you. It can quite cozy on a chilly night.
No need to be so defensive, Misaka. I think your shorts are a very practical wardrobe choice.
I don't think I've ever seen prosthetics quite that close to the original limb. Pardon me, but I almost want to call it a technological marvel!
Bernadetta, wait! I feel confident that you can hold off on removing the lower half until your- she's not hearing me, is she?
Change of plans? No issue. Our Tactician says that nothing is final until your hand let's go of the piece.
Macedonia? If I recall my history lesions correctly, Macedonia opposed the Hero King's Archanean League, did it not?
This may be my only chance to ask you, what's so important about asymmetrical fashion? It's the one thing about Father I don't understand.
I see you're starting to take this a bit more seriously. You're not nervous, are you, Lady Palutena?
Oh, well hello, Cupil! He's somewhat cute... in his own strange little way.
Speaking of socks, I found the cutest pair at the market the other day. They have a colorful octopus pattern all over them!

state.text: (What would it be like to travel alongside ~name~? What things would we have seen together? Maybe in another life, it would've been possible.)

case.state: It's just ~clothing.ifPlural(a ~clothing~|~clothing)~... And yet I still like she's hiding something.
If it's anything like visiting the Smash realms, then I suppose not everyone here needs to get along...
(At the very least, not everyone I've met here is like ~name~... I should prioritize keeping them safe.)
Just be thankful it's me here and not my sister, ~name~. She'd give you a twenty minute speech about "reformation and repentance"!

state.text: I wonder if this is what Emmeryn would want if she was still with us. Moving past our differences without fighting.

case.state: Thank you for your work, ~name~. Saving even one life is a great feat.
You don't possess the power to heal clothing do you? ... Sorry, I'm still not very good at making jokes.

state.text: (If that's the case, then the Risen under Grima's control have lost their identities! For them, and for everyone, I will strike him down!!)

case.state: (It would be so ideal if we could even bring some of them back, similar to ~name~. Alas, that's not how it works back home.)
(~Name~ isn't a Risen though. I have to cast aside my previous experiences and accept her at face value.)
Shouldn't you have rather have removed this before showing us your privates?
This... isn't exactly the order I would have chosen to remove my clothes in, but...
To be perfectly honest, your choices for the order of what you strip leaves me... confused.

If there is time after the game, perhaps I could take you! Mother tells me I have a very distinctive taste!

How many small items like that do you have left, ~name~?

I hope that you'll invite me back in the future. Farewell for now, ~player~.
Well, it seems that game has concluded. Just... make sure my father knows nothing of this.
Well, that... happened. Anyone want to go visit a hot spring with me now? A bath would be the perfect way to cap this off.
I'll be out training in the back. If any of you need anything, please let me know!
Your relief is my relief, Ignatz. Now that we are back on even ground, shall we continue?

scene.name: Intro1
scene.directive: After the game, Lucina and the rest of the players made a visit to the local hot spring.
Lucina greatly enjoyed this chance to simply relax with others, but she knew that she would soon have to return to her own world.

Unsure if she would ever get to see her newly made friend again, Lucina gave you a hug before heading through the Outrealm portal that would transport her back to Ylisse for her final showdown with the Fell Dragon Grima.

scene.name: Intro 2
scene.directive: Lucina and her allies emerged victorious, changing the fate of her previously doomed world.

However, after the climatic battle, when Lucina went to confess her love to the tactician who had led their army to victory, she was devastated to hear that he had already given his heart to a different woman.
Feeling out of place in a world that no longer needed her, Lucina disappeared after whispering these words to her infant self: "Yours will be a happy future.".
Did she journey to another land or back to her own time? No one knows for certain...

scene.name: Hotsprings Outside 1
scene.directive: One and a half years later...

scene.name: Hotsprings Inside 1
scene.directive: As the two of you enter the bathhouse together, you feel yourself quickly beginning to feel more comfortable in the warm, misty air of the hot spring.
While the two of you are surveying your accommodations, you notice that Lucina is acting a bit odd...
Suddenly, she steps in front of you with sudden resolve clearly written on her beautiful face.
Could she possibly be talking about... that?
Suddenly relaxing in the bath is the last thing on your mind.
Having a pretty good idea of where your wife is going with this, you quickly comply with her request.

scene.name: Finale
scene.directive: Lucina turns to face the horizon and takes ahold of your hand in anticipation of the show to come.
